analyzed: smin mtshams kyi dbus su zhugs par byas par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: it entered into the middle of the eyebrows.

original: slar yang rdo rje'i lam nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: slar yang rdo rje'i lam nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Again, from the vajra path means

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi thabs kyi rdo rje'i lam nas so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi thabs kyi rdo rje'i lam nas so //
translated: from the Bhagavān’s method vajra path.

original: lcags kyu'i rnam pa can gyi 'od zer chen po zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi lcags kyu dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer chen po'i 'od kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: lcags kyu'i rnam pa can gyi 'od zer chen po zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi lcags kyu dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer chen po'i 'od kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The great light ray called “hook-like” is the nature of light of a great light ray like a hook of the nature of intuition.

original: nye bar spros nas zhes bya ba ni spros nas so //
analyzed: nye bar spros nas zhes bya ba ni spros nas so //
translated: Having emanated, means having sent forth.

original: slar yang rdo rje'i lam nas gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: slar yang rdo rje'i lam nas gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Again, from the vajra path, to the wheel of the crown,

original: gzhan rnams kyis ma mthong ba'i spyi bo la'o //
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyis ma mthong ba'i spyi bo la'o //
translated: means to the head, which is not seen by others.

original: nye bar byung bar gyur pa zhes bya ba ni zhugs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar byung bar gyur pa zhes bya ba ni zhugs par gyur pa'o //
translated: Having come near, means having entered.

original: ci zhig byas nas zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas zhe na /
translated: What does it do?

original: de'i phyir des de lta bu dag la reg nas zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir des de lta bu dag la reg nas zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “having touched those in that way.”

original: des zhes bya ba ni 'od zer gyi dra ba rdo rje'i lam nas spros pas so //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni 'od zer gyi dra ba rdo rje'i lam nas spros pas so //
translated: “That” means the net of light rays, having been sent forth from the vajra path.

original: de lta bur gyur pa ni rgyal bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa ni rgyal bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la'o //
translated: “Those in that way” means to the victors, the bodhisattvas.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: de'i phyir rdo rje'i phreng ba dang 'dra bar zhes gsungs te ;
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje'i phreng ba dang 'dra bar zhes gsungs te ;
translated: Therefore, it is said, “like a vajra garland.”

original: ji ltar rdo rje'i phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin kha dog lnga'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba spros pa sngon du 'gro bar sdud par byed pa de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rdo rje'i phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin kha dog lnga'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba spros pa sngon du 'gro bar sdud par byed pa de bzhin du'o //
translated: Just as the vajra garland is the emanation of the garland of five-colored light rays, which are the nature of the five transcendent lords, so also.

original: de ltar 'od zer gyi dra ba nye bar bsdu ba bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rang rang gi gnas su gnas par byed pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar 'od zer gyi dra ba nye bar bsdu ba bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rang rang gi gnas su gnas par byed pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Having thus taught the gathering of the net of light rays, in order to state that the bodhisattvas are situated in their own places,

original: @13b slar yang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: @13b slar yang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says again.🔽The net of light rays that entered the uṣṇīṣa cakra again emanates from the navel of one’s heart center.

original: gtsug tor gyi 'khor lor zhugs pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba slar yang rang gi snying ga'i lte ba'i bug nas spros te zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga'i lte ba'i bu ga ni dbus kyi gnas su padma dang zla ba dang / h'um yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa des spros te /
analyzed: gtsug tor gyi 'khor lor zhugs pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba slar yang rang gi snying ga'i lte ba'i bug nas spros te zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga'i lte ba'i bu ga ni dbus kyi gnas su padma dang zla ba dang / h'um yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa des spros te /
translated: The navel of one’s heart center is the central place, which is blessed by the lotus, moon, and syllable hūṃ.

original: rang gi snying ga'i dbus nas spros te /
analyzed: rang gi snying ga'i dbus nas spros te /
translated: Emanating from the center of one’s heart,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang rang gi gdan la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang rang gi gdan la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: the bodhisattvas are situated on their own seats.

original: zla ba dang nyi ma dang padma'i gdan la sogs pa dbye ba tha dang bas dbye bar byas pa rnams la bcom ldan 'das sbyor bar mdzad de rgyal ba rnams bzhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma dang padma'i gdan la sogs pa dbye ba tha dang bas dbye bar byas pa rnams la bcom ldan 'das sbyor bar mdzad de rgyal ba rnams bzhugs par gyur to //
translated: The Blessed One, having united with the moon, sun, lotus seat, etc., which are differentiated by the various divisions, became the Victorious Ones.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What kind of bodhisattvas?

original: de'i phyir bde ba chen po zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bde ba chen po zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “great bliss.”

original: bde ba chen po ni 'od gsal gyi rnam par rgyal ba de'i ming gzhan no //
analyzed: bde ba chen po ni 'od gsal gyi rnam par rgyal ba de'i ming gzhan no //
translated: Great bliss is another name for the victorious clear light.

original: nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba ni rig par byed pa'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba ni rig par byed pa'o //
translated: “Experience” means to make known.

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: What did they do?

original: de'i phyir rdo rje'i h'um yig brjod pa zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje'i h'um yig brjod pa zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “the vajra hūṃ sound.”

original: de lta bu'i sgra brjod nas de sad bar byed pa'i thabs nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sgra brjod nas de sad bar byed pa'i thabs nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Having uttered such a sound, it is the method for awakening them.

original: gzhan yang bde ba chen po de nyid nyams su myong ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang bde ba chen po de nyid nyams su myong ba ste /
translated: Moreover, that very great bliss is experienced.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis spros pas 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po la reg nas ji ltar mchog tu dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed cing bde ba chen po des nyon mongs pa med pas rjes su 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa'o ;🔽/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rang rang gi gnas su gnas pa'i gnas skabs byed pa'i mthar thug pas 'khor snod du bya ba mngon par brjod nas /🔽da ni snod du gyur pa'i slob ma'i bya ba'i yan lag bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa byed par rtsom pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /🔽de nas de rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis spros pas 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po la reg nas ji ltar mchog tu dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed cing bde ba chen po des nyon mongs pa med pas rjes su 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa'o ; / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rang rang gi gnas su gnas pa'i gnas skabs byed pa'i mthar thug pas 'khor snod du bya ba mngon par brjod nas / da ni snod du gyur pa'i slob ma'i bya ba'i yan lag bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa byed par rtsom pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir / de nas de rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The Bhagavān, having touched the great web of light rays, experiences supreme joy and is connected with that great bliss without afflictions.🔽Thus, having described the disciples who are vessels for the disciples of the bodhisattvas in their own abodes,

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor rnams te /🔽bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par bstod do zhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor rnams te /🔽bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par bstod do zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: now, in order to demonstrate the disciples who are vessels for the disciples of the Bhagavān, the disciples who are vessels for the disciples of the Bhagavān, the disciples who are vessels original: ston pa rdo rje 'chang chen pos bstod pas yongs su dga' bar gyur to //
analyzed: ston pa rdo rje 'chang chen pos bstod pas yongs su dga' bar gyur to //
translated: The Teacher, Great Vajradhara, praised them, and they became delighted.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: de'i phyir dga' ba'i yid can zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po nyams su myong bas sems dga' ba skyes so //
analyzed: de'i phyir dga' ba'i yid can zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po nyams su myong bas sems dga' ba skyes so //
translated: Therefore, with a delighted mind, they experienced the great bliss of the absence of defilements, and their minds became joyful.

original: gzhan yang chu'i gting nas thon pa lta bur zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang chu'i gting nas thon pa lta bur zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Moreover, like emerging from the depths of water,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po'i bdag nyid chen por shes nas so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po'i bdag nyid chen por shes nas so //
translated: they recognized the greatness of the nature of the Blessed One's great web of light rays.

original: ji ltar kha cig chu klung gi dbus nas langs te dga' ba dang bcas @14a * //
analyzed: ji ltar kha cig chu klung gi dbus nas langs te dga' ba dang bcas @14a * //
translated: Just as someone, having risen from the middle of a river, is delighted

original: par rlom pa de dang 'dra bar ro //
analyzed: par rlom pa de dang 'dra bar ro //
translated: and conceited, so it is.

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: What did they do?

original: de'i phyir ngo mtshar chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir ngo mtshar chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said great wonder and so forth.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag nyid chen po'i cho 'phrul ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag nyid chen po'i cho 'phrul ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ste /
translated: The great magic of the Blessed One, Great Vajradhara, is the miraculous manifestation.

original: 'od zer spro ba'i sgo nas khyad par can go 'phang ngal so ba'i ngo bo ngo mtshar chen po mthong nas so //
analyzed: 'od zer spro ba'i sgo nas khyad par can go 'phang ngal so ba'i ngo bo ngo mtshar chen po mthong nas so //
translated: Having seen the great wonder of the nature of the state of ease, which is the special state of emitting light rays, he praises the Bhagavān.

original: gzhan yang shin tu mig gdangs pa ni shin tu gnas kyang mig rab tu rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang shin tu mig gdangs pa ni shin tu gnas kyang mig rab tu rgyas pa'o //
translated: Moreover, “wide open eyes” means that the eyes are wide open, very much so.

original: ji ltar bstod pa mdzad ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar bstod pa mdzad ce na /
translated: How does he praise?

original: de'i phyir dbyangs gcig gis zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dbyangs gcig gis zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, he says, “with a single voice.”

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod pa rtsom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod pa rtsom pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the composition of the praise,

original: da ni dngos su bstod pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni dngos su bstod pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to directly state the praise,

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, “Bhagavān,” and so on.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas rgyas //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas rgyas //
translated: Swollen with connate joy.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Here,

original: 'dis ni so sor sdud pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstod pa brjod de /
analyzed: 'dis ni so sor sdud pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstod pa brjod de /
translated: he praises the Bhagavān with the nature of the practice of withdrawal.

original: de la yul lnga po rnams la dbang po rnams kyis gzung bas lhan cig skyes pa gang zhig ni rang gi dga' ba gzung ba'i rnam pa'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: de la yul lnga po rnams la dbang po rnams kyis gzung bas lhan cig skyes pa gang zhig ni rang gi dga' ba gzung ba'i rnam pa'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: There, “connate” is that which is grasped by the senses with regard to the five objects, which has the nature of the aspect of grasping one’s own joy.

original: des rgyas pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'o zhes bod pa'o //
analyzed: des rgyas pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'o zhes bod pa'o //
translated: The pervasion is the complete perfection.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: de'i phyir ro gcig tu gyur pa myang ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir ro gcig tu gyur pa myang ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore, the enjoyment of the single taste means

original: yul lnga po tha mi dad par rtogs pas myang ba ni nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: yul lnga po tha mi dad par rtogs pas myang ba ni nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
translated: the enjoyment of the five objects, because they are realized as undifferentiated.

original: ji skad du dbang po bcu po rnams kyi ni //
analyzed: ji skad du dbang po bcu po rnams kyi ni //
translated: As it is said, The ten faculties

original: rang gi 'jug gnas thams cad du //
analyzed: rang gi 'jug gnas thams cad du //
translated: in all their engagement and abiding

original: so sor sdud ces brjod pa ste //
analyzed: so sor sdud ces brjod pa ste //
translated: are said to be the withdrawal,

original: 'dod pa'i so sor longs spyod pa //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i so sor longs spyod pa // zhes gsungs so //
translated: the enjoyment of the objects of desire.

original: bsam gtan gtan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bsam gtan gtan pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the meditative concentration,

original: bcom ldan 'das ro gcig ngal bso kye zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ro gcig ngal bso kye zhes gsungs te /
translated: the Bhagavān said, The enjoyment of the single taste, O Restful One.

original: gzugs la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa rnam pa gsum dang ldan pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi rnam pa nyid kyi ro gcig pa'i go 'phang la ngal bso ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa rnam pa gsum dang ldan pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi rnam pa nyid kyi ro gcig pa'i go 'phang la ngal bso ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the three types of pleasant forms, etc. are the state of the single taste of the three Tathāgatas themselves, for the sake of resting in that.

original: ci ngal bso ba ste de'i bod pa la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: ci ngal bso ba ste de'i bod pa la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Is it the resting in that? The enjoyment of that is called the enjoyment of the single taste.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore, the enjoyment of the single taste means🔽the enjoyment of the five objects, because they are realized as undifferentiated.🔽As it is said, The ten faculties🔽in all their engagement and abiding🔽are said to be the withdrawal,🔽the enjoyment of the objects of desire.

original: ngag gi lam gyi spyod yul 'das //
analyzed: ngag gi lam gyi spyod yul 'das //
translated: Transcends the domain of verbal expression.

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: Thus, it is said.

original: yul rnam pa gsum la tha dad pa'i dmigs pa med pa'i rtog pas sgra dang rnam par rtog pa'i yul las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul rnam pa gsum la tha dad pa'i dmigs pa med pa'i rtog pas sgra dang rnam par rtog pa'i yul las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is beyond the domain of sound and conceptual thought, which are different objects of the three types of conceptual thought that lack a different object.

original: de ltar bsam gtan gyi sgo nas bstod pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bsam gtan gyi sgo nas bstod pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus praised the Bhagavān from the perspective of meditative concentration,

original: nga ni srog rtsol gyi sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nga ni srog rtsol gyi sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach from the perspective of prāṇa and āyāma,

original: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, “The Bhagavān himself,” and so on.

original: rang gi nyams myong @14b dga' ba ni rlung dang rnam par shes pa'i ming can gyis yang dag bde ba ni dkyil 'khor bzhi 'char ba'i rim pas dbang du gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽'gro ba gsum po ni 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang ldang ba'i bdag nyid can gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: rang gi nyams myong @14b dga' ba ni rlung dang rnam par shes pa'i ming can gyis yang dag bde ba ni dkyil 'khor bzhi 'char ba'i rim pas dbang du gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro // 'gro ba gsum po ni 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang ldang ba'i bdag nyid can gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: His own experience is the bliss of the vāyu and the mind, which is the true bliss that is mastered by the process of the arising of the four cakras.🔽The three migrations are those that exist in the nature of entering, abiding, and rising.

original: de la bod pa'o //
analyzed: de la bod pa'o //
translated: That is the meaning of “the three migrations.”

original: de ltar srog dang rtsol ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar srog dang rtsol ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus explained prāṇa and āyāma,🔽now, in order to explain the bindu,

original: 'dzin pa'i sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to express the nature of the mind of grasping as clear light,🔽it is said:

original: ae ma'o lhan cig skyes bdud rtsi /🔽ro ston thugs rje chen po kye //
analyzed: ae ma'o lhan cig skyes bdud rtsi / ro ston thugs rje chen po kye //
translated: Ema! The innate nectar,

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: the great compassion which teaches the taste,

original: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
translated: Ema! is a term of amazement.

original: lhan cig skyes pa ni ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa ni ma byas pa'o //
translated: Innate is unfabricated.

original: bdud rtsi'i ro zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi dang 'dra bar sems 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa brjod pa'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i ro zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi dang 'dra bar sems 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa brjod pa'o //
translated: The taste of nectar is the clear light nature of mind, which is like nectar.

original: des gtor bzhi de mngon du byed pa'i rnam pa ste lhan cig skyes pa'i bdud rtsi'i ros gtor ba la de bod pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: des gtor bzhi de mngon du byed pa'i rnam pa ste lhan cig skyes pa'i bdud rtsi'i ros gtor ba la de bod pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The one who scatters the four is the one who actualizes it. The one who scatters the taste of the innate nectar is called that.

original: thugs rje chen po zhes bya ba ni rang nyid kyis rtogs pa'i sems 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa skyob pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir gzhan dag la bstan pa'i thugs rje chen po'o //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po zhes bya ba ni rang nyid kyis rtogs pa'i sems 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa skyob pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir gzhan dag la bstan pa'i thugs rje chen po'o //
translated: Great compassion is the great compassion of teaching others, in order to teach the nature of the clear light mind which is realized by oneself.

original: de ltar sems 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa bstan pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: de ltar sems 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa bstan pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: Thus, it is in terms of teaching the nature of the clear light mind of grasping.

original: da ni rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i sgo nas rtogs pa brjod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i sgo nas rtogs pa brjod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to explain the realization by way of teaching the stage of self-consecration, [the Bhagavān] declares, “the Bhagavān, ” and so on.

original: sems can thams cad ces bya ba ni gang zag rnam pa lngas bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad ces bya ba ni gang zag rnam pa lngas bsdus pa'o //
translated: “ All sentient beings” are included in the five types of persons.

original: sems can don du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems can don du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “ For the sake of sentient beings”

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i sku bstan pa la gsal ba mdzad pa la gzung bar brtson pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i sku bstan pa la gsal ba mdzad pa la gzung bar brtson pa'o //
translated: is the effort to apprehend the manifestation of the teaching of the illusory body.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i 'dzin pa'i sgo nas bstod pa brjod pa'i phyir /🔽de nyid gsum ni ro gcig pa //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i 'dzin pa'i sgo nas bstod pa brjod pa'i phyir / de nyid gsum ni ro gcig pa //
translated: In order to express praise by way of apprehending the naturally radiant,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “the three realities are of one taste, ” and so on.

original: gsum po stong pa dang / shin tu stong pa dang / stong pa dang / stong pa chen po'i rnam pa'i de kho na nyid kyi ye shes rnams kyi ro gcig pa ni thams cad stong pa'i gnas skabs la'o //
analyzed: gsum po stong pa dang / shin tu stong pa dang / stong pa dang / stong pa chen po'i rnam pa'i de kho na nyid kyi ye shes rnams kyi ro gcig pa ni thams cad stong pa'i gnas skabs la'o //
translated: The three realities are the wisdoms of the thatness of the aspects of emptiness, utter emptiness, emptiness, and great emptiness, which are of one taste in the state of all emptiness.

original: de gcig pa ni gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcu gsum pas bsdus pa'o ;
analyzed: de gcig pa ni gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcu gsum pas bsdus pa'o ;
translated: That one is the Great Seal, which is included in the thirteenth, because it is not shared with others.

original: / des rab tu dbye ba ni de mngon du byas pas bag chags kyi gnas skabs can gyi rang bzhin gyi tshogs spangs ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / des rab tu dbye ba ni de mngon du byas pas bag chags kyi gnas skabs can gyi rang bzhin gyi tshogs spangs ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The division by that is because by realizing that, the collection of natures which is the state of habitual tendencies is abandoned.

original: zung du 'jug pa'i rnam pa rjes su dran pa bstan pa'i phyir brjod pa /
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa'i rnam pa rjes su dran pa bstan pa'i phyir brjod pa /
translated: In order to teach the recollection of the aspect of union, he says:

original: bcom ldan rnal 'byor che la dgyes //🔽zhes gsungs te /🔽rnal 'byor yang yin la chen @15a * //🔽bo yang yin pas na rnal 'byor chen po ste kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa dbyer med pa rnam pa la de dgyes pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan rnal 'byor che la dgyes // zhes gsungs te / rnal 'byor yang yin la chen @15a * // bo yang yin pas na rnal 'byor chen po ste kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa dbyer med pa rnam pa la de dgyes pa ste /
translated: The Bhagavat is delighted in the great yoga.

original: de la bod pa la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la bod pa la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Since it is a yoga and it is great, it is the great yoga, the aspect of the inseparability of the conventional and ultimate truths. He is delighted in that, and he is called that.

original: mdud pa thams cad gcod mdzad pa //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mdud pa thams cad gcod mdzad pa //🔽zhes bya ba la /
translated: He cuts all the knots.

original: mdud pa thams cad ni tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog pa can gyi rnam pa can rnams la khyad par du gcod par byed pa'i phyir mdud pa thams cad gcod pa ste /
analyzed: mdud pa thams cad ni tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog pa can gyi rnam pa can rnams la khyad par du gcod par byed pa'i phyir mdud pa thams cad gcod pa ste /
translated: He cuts all bonds, because he cuts off all bonds, which are the various forms of conceptualization that are differentiated.

original: de la bod pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la bod pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is called the one who cuts all bonds because he cuts them.

original: de ltar sbyor ba'i yan lag drug gi sgo nas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar sbyor ba'i yan lag drug gi sgo nas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa brjod nas /
translated: Having thus praised the Lord in terms of the six branches of worship,

original: de nyid kyi nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the summary of that very praise, he says:

original: ae ma zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
analyzed: ae ma zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
translated: Amazing! means wonderful!

original: yul lnga la nye bar dmigs pas dga' ba chen po ni dgyes pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: yul lnga la nye bar dmigs pas dga' ba chen po ni dgyes pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: Great joy is a special delight, because it is the object of the five objects.

original: de byed pas na dga' ba chen po byed pa'o //
analyzed: de byed pas na dga' ba chen po byed pa'o //
translated: He who creates great joy is the one who creates that.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'gro bskal bzang mdzes par mdzad de zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'gro bskal bzang mdzes par mdzad de zhes bya ba ste /
translated: He makes the world beautiful with good fortune means

original: 'gro ba ni khams gsum pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba ni khams gsum pa'o //
translated: the world is the three realms.

original: skal bzang zhes bya ba'i ni yul 'dzin pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: skal bzang zhes bya ba'i ni yul 'dzin pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: Good fortune is the nature of the object of perception.

original: des na mdzes pa ste /
analyzed: des na mdzes pa ste /
translated: He makes it beautiful means🔽he makes it beautiful with good fortune.

original: rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad la mkho bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad la mkho bar byed pa'o //
translated: It is necessary for all yogis and yoginis.

original: 'dis ni so sor sdud pa'i nye bar bsdu ba bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni so sor sdud pa'i nye bar bsdu ba bstan to //
translated: By this, the summary of the withdrawal practice is taught.

original: bsam gtan nye bar bsdu ba ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan nye bar bsdu ba ni /
translated: The summary of meditative concentration is taught by

original: ae ma'o rdo rje theg pa bde //
analyzed: ae ma'o rdo rje theg pa bde //
translated: Oh! The Vajrayana is blissful.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth.

original: rdo rje theg pa'i sgra ni sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa'i sgra ni sngar bshad zin to //
translated: The term Vajrayana has been explained before.

original: rdo rje theg pa ni sngags kyi theg pa la dga' ba ni yul la yang dag par brten pa'i ngang ngang tshul gyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa ni sngags kyi theg pa la dga' ba ni yul la yang dag par brten pa'i ngang ngang tshul gyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: Delighting in the Vajrayana means having the nature of relying on the object with a pure attitude.

original: des rab tu dga' ba ni lus kyi bde ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: des rab tu dga' ba ni lus kyi bde ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: By that, delight means having the characteristic of physical bliss.

original: mgu ba ni sems las byung ba'i bde ba sems can thams cad la ster bar byed pas rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba gsol ba'o //
analyzed: mgu ba ni sems las byung ba'i bde ba sems can thams cad la ster bar byed pas rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba gsol ba'o //
translated: Pleased means delighting and being pleased by bestowing mental bliss upon all sentient beings.

original: yang na dga' ba ni yul yid du 'ong ba mthong bas 'dod chags kyi rnam par dag pa ni dga' ba'o //
analyzed: yang na dga' ba ni yul yid du 'ong ba mthong bas 'dod chags kyi rnam par dag pa ni dga' ba'o //
translated: Alternatively, delight means the purification of the aspect of desire by seeing a pleasing object.

original: yid du mi 'ong ba mthong bas zhe sdang gi rnam par dag pas rab tu dga' ba'o //
analyzed: yid du mi 'ong ba mthong bas zhe sdang gi rnam par dag pas rab tu dga' ba'o //
translated: The joy of seeing the unpleasant is the purification of the aspect of hatred.

original: bar ma'i yul mthong bas gti mug gi rnam par dag pas mgu ba ste /
analyzed: bar ma'i yul mthong bas gti mug gi rnam par dag pas mgu ba ste /
translated: The delight of seeing the neutral is the purification of the aspect of delusion.

original: de gsol pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de gsol pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The statement “he said” is as before.

original: srog dang rtsol ba'i nye bar bsdu ba ni /
analyzed: srog dang rtsol ba'i nye bar bsdu ba ni /
translated: The summary of vitality and exertion is:

original: ae ma'o sngags ni rab rgyas pa'o //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: ae ma'o sngags ni rab rgyas pa'o // zhes gsungs te /
translated: Amazing! The expansion of the mantra!

original: sngags ni yi ge gsum gyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: sngags ni yi ge gsum gyi rnam pa'o //
translated: The mantra is the form of the three syllables.

original: de nyid rgyas pa ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rlung gsum la sbyor ba'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de nyid rgyas pa ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rlung gsum la sbyor ba'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The expansion of that is the nature of the application to the three vāyus of entry and so on.

original: des rang byung gi go 'phang ni rang nyid la gnas pa'i dbugs kyi 'khor lo sgrub pa po la mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: des rang byung gi go 'phang ni rang nyid la gnas pa'i dbugs kyi 'khor lo sgrub pa po la mtshon pa ste /
translated: By that, the stage of self-origination is the accomplishment of the wheel of vāyu abiding in oneself, which is illustrated to the practitioner.

original: rang byung gi @15b go 'phang sgrub pa po'o //
analyzed: rang byung gi @15b go 'phang sgrub pa po'o //
translated: The stage of self-origination is the practitioner.

original: yang na rang byung gi go 'phang ni 'od gsal ba'i rnam pas bsgrub pa de bzhin du sems kyi 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo 'dzin pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang na rang byung gi go 'phang ni 'od gsal ba'i rnam pas bsgrub pa de bzhin du sems kyi 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo 'dzin pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Alternatively, the stage of self-origination is the accomplishment of the aspect of lucid clarity.

original: ae ma'o / shin tu zab mo'i chos //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: ae ma'o / shin tu zab mo'i chos // zhes gsungs te /
translated: Oh! The very profound Dharma!

original: shin tu zab mo'i chos kyi ngo bo la sems 'od gsal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽dmigs pa med pa ston par mdzad //
analyzed: shin tu zab mo'i chos kyi ngo bo la sems 'od gsal ba nyid kyi phyir ro // dmigs pa med pa ston par mdzad //
translated: It is because the nature of the very profound Dharma is the clear light of mind.

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: He reveals the absence of an objective reference.

original: dmigs pa med pa ni 'jug pa dang nyon mongs pa can dang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa dang bral ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir de ston par mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa ni 'jug pa dang nyon mongs pa can dang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa dang bral ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir de ston par mdzad pa ste /
translated: It is because he reveals the absence of an objective reference, which is the meaning of being free from the objective reference of the engaged consciousness, the afflicted consciousness, and the fundamental consciousness.

original: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ngo bo 'dzin pa nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ngo bo 'dzin pa nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to reveal the nature of the self-consecration, the summary of the retention of the meaning, he says:

original: ae ma'o shin tu gsang ba gsang ba'i bdag //🔽ces gsungs te /
analyzed: ae ma'o shin tu gsang ba gsang ba'i bdag // ces gsungs te /
translated: Oh! The very secret, the secret self!

original: gsang ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pas thob par bya ba'i sngags kyi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: gsang ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pas thob par bya ba'i sngags kyi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The secret is the nature of the mantra to be attained by the practice of the creation stage.

original: de las kyang gsang ba ni skad cig ma dang lugs las bzlog pa'i rim pa dag gis 'od gsal ba las rdzogs pa'i bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: de las kyang gsang ba ni skad cig ma dang lugs las bzlog pa'i rim pa dag gis 'od gsal ba las rdzogs pa'i bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku'o //
translated: And the secret is the body of the perfected self-consecration, which is clearlight transparency, by the stages of the instant and the reverse order.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Great Vajradhara is because of the illustration by the twelve examples of illusion.

original: gtso bo zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku bstan pas gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtso bo zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku bstan pas gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The chief is because of the accomplishment of the aim of others by the teaching of the body which is like an illusion.🔽 The gathering is because of the gathering of the nature of clearlight transparency.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo 'dzin pa nye bar bsdu ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo 'dzin pa nye bar bsdu ba'i phyir /
translated: The marvelous is because of the marvel of the body which is like an illusion.

original: ae ma'o mchog tu byang chub pa //🔽zhes gsungs te ;
analyzed: ae ma'o mchog tu byang chub pa // zhes gsungs te ;
translated: The supreme enlightenment is because of the supreme enlightenment of the body which is like an illusion.🔽 The marvelous is because of the marvel of the body which is like an illusion.🔽 The supreme enlightenment is because of the supreme enlightenment of the body which is like an illusion.🔽 The marvelous is because of the marvel of the body which is like an illusion.🔽 The supreme enlightenment is because of the supreme enlightenment of the body which is like an illusion.🔽 The marvelous is because of the marvel of the body which is like an illusion.🔽 The supreme enlightenment is because of the supreme enlightenment of the body which is like an illusion.🔽 The marvelous is because of the marvel of the body which is like an illusion.🔽 The supreme enlightenment is because of the supreme enlightenment of the body which is like an illusion.🔽 The marvelous is because of the marvel of the body which is like an illusion.🔽 The supreme enlightenment is because of the supreme enlightenment of the body which is like an illusion.🔽 The marvelous is because of the marvel of the body which is like an illusion.🔽 The supreme enlightenment is because of the supreme enlightenment of the body which is like an illusion.🔽 The marvelous is because of the marvel of the body which is like an illusion.🔽 The supreme enlightenment is because of the supreme enlightenment of the body which is like an illusion.🔽 The marvelous is because of the marvel of the body which is like an illusion.

original: mchog ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim par thob par bya ba'i stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mchog ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim par thob par bya ba'i stong pa nyid do //
translated: The supreme enlightenment is because of the supreme enlightenment of the body which is like an illusion.🔽 The

original: de'i tshul ni thob par byed pa'i rgyu ting nge 'dzin dang phyag rgya'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshul ni thob par byed pa'i rgyu ting nge 'dzin dang phyag rgya'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The method is the characteristic of the cause of attainment, which is the stage of meditative concentration and the stage of the seal.

original: des snang ba ni de la mos pa de 'od gsal bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid de rab tu ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: des snang ba ni de la mos pa de 'od gsal bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid de rab tu ston par byed pa'o //
translated: The appearance is the characteristic of the illumination of that, which is the teaching of the illumination of that devotion.

original: zung du 'jug pa'i ngo bo rjes su dran pa nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /🔽ae ma'o spros pa rnams dang bral //
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa'i ngo bo rjes su dran pa nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir / ae ma'o spros pa rnams dang bral //
translated: In order to teach the summary of the recollection of the nature of union,

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: it is said:🔽Amazing! Free from elaborations!

original: tha dad pa'i spros pa las rnam par grol ba nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i spros pa las rnam par grol ba nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because of being liberated from the elaborations of difference,

original: bden pa'i don ni gsal mdzad pa //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bden pa'i don ni gsal mdzad pa // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the meaning of truth is made clear.

original: bden pa'i don ni rgyu dang 'bras bu tha mi dad pa'am slob pa'am mi slob pa'i dbye ba la rab tu ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bden pa'i don ni rgyu dang 'bras bu tha mi dad pa'am slob pa'am mi slob pa'i dbye ba la rab tu ston par byed pa'o //
translated: The meaning of truth is taught as the non-difference of cause and effect, or as the division of the learner and the non-learner.

original: khyed drin gyis zhes bya ba ni ston pa po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i drin gyis bdag po'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: khyed drin gyis zhes bya ba ni ston pa po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i drin gyis bdag po'i dbang gis so //
translated: By your kindness means by the kindness of the teacher, the Bhagavān Vajrasattva, by the power of the lord.

original: bdag cag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
analyzed: bdag cag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
translated: “We” refers to the bodhisattvas.

original: rdo rje sems @16a * //🔽dpa'i go 'phang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje sems @16a * // dpa'i go 'phang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The “state of Vajrasattva”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa drug po thob tu rung ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa drug po thob tu rung ba'o //
translated: is the attainment of the sixth tathāgata.

original: thob pa zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: thob pa zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'o //
translated: “Attainment” means realization.

original: mgon po zhes bya ba ni de la bod pa'o //
analyzed: mgon po zhes bya ba ni de la bod pa'o //
translated: “Lord” means the one who has attained that.

original: lam log zhugs zhes bya ba ni da lta rtsod pa'i dus na shes rab dman pa nyid kyis 'dod chags dang bal ba'i theg pas myur du rnam par grol ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lam log zhugs zhes bya ba ni da lta rtsod pa'i dus na shes rab dman pa nyid kyis 'dod chags dang bal ba'i theg pas myur du rnam par grol ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Those who have entered the wrong path” means those who, in the age of conflict, due to their inferior wisdom, do not quickly attain liberation through the vehicle of desire and anger.

original: bdag cag ces bya ba ni 'khor rnams so //
analyzed: bdag cag ces bya ba ni 'khor rnams so //
translated: “We” refers to the retinue.

original: mgon po zhes bya ba ni sngon bzhin no //
analyzed: mgon po zhes bya ba ni sngon bzhin no //
translated: “Lord” is as before.

original: khyed kyis zhes bya ba ni ston pa po rdo rje 'chang gis so //
analyzed: khyed kyis zhes bya ba ni ston pa po rdo rje 'chang gis so //
translated: “You” refers to the teacher Vajradhara.

original: lam la zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po sngags kyi lam spyod pa gsum pa gsum po gtso bor gyur pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par byed pa la bkod pa'o //
analyzed: lam la zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po sngags kyi lam spyod pa gsum pa gsum po gtso bor gyur pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par byed pa la bkod pa'o //
translated: “On the path” means that he has placed them on the path of the Mahāyāna mantra, the three conducts, which is the principal cause for attaining the state of Mahāvajradhara.

original: 'jig rten mun 'thoms zhes bya ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi lam thos pas 'khrugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten mun 'thoms zhes bya ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi lam thos pas 'khrugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The world is in darkness means that it is disturbed by hearing the various paths of the Bhagavān.

original: bdag cag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
analyzed: bdag cag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
translated: We means the bodhisattvas.

original: mgon po zhes bya ba ni sngon bzhin no //
analyzed: mgon po zhes bya ba ni sngon bzhin no //
translated: Lord means as before.

original: ye shes snang bzhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ye shes snang bzhes bya ba ni /
translated: The light of pristine consciousness means

original: chos kyi sku'i ngo bo 'od gsal gyi thabs la'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sku'i ngo bo 'od gsal gyi thabs la'o //
translated: the method of the clear light, the essence of the dharmakāya.

original: sbyor bar mdzad ces bya ba ni 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: sbyor bar mdzad ces bya ba ni 'jug pa ste /
translated: The application is the engagement

original: 'od zer spros pas snod nyid du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'od zer spros pas snod nyid du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the light rays make one a suitable vessel.

original: khyod kyis zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis so //
analyzed: khyod kyis zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis so //
translated: Yours means the Bhagavān.

original: dam tshig nyi ma zhes bya ba la dam tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga ste /
analyzed: dam tshig nyi ma zhes bya ba la dam tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga ste /
translated: The sun of the sacred pledge means the five tathāgatas.

original: nyon mongs pa lnga dang / phung po lnga rnam par spyod ba'i rim gyis ye shes lnga'i ngo bo mngon du byed pas mi 'da' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa lnga dang / phung po lnga rnam par spyod ba'i rim gyis ye shes lnga'i ngo bo mngon du byed pas mi 'da' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Since the five afflictions and the five aggregates are the essence of the five pristine consciousnesses, they are not transgressed by the process of purification.

original: de rnams nyi ma dang 'dra bas na nyi ma ste /
analyzed: de rnams nyi ma dang 'dra bas na nyi ma ste /
translated: Since they are like the sun, they are suns.

original: gtso cher gsal bar mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gtso cher gsal bar mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is mainly manifested.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i don zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i don zhes bya ba la /
translated: The meaning of the Great Seal,

original: phyag rgya chen po ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo rnam pa med pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo rnam pa med pa'o //
translated: the Great Seal is the nature of the stage of manifest enlightenment, which is without aspects.

original: de nyid ni don te 'bras bu'i ngo bo ste ston par mdzad pa ni 'od zer bkye ba nyid kyis snod du mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni don te 'bras bu'i ngo bo ste ston par mdzad pa ni 'od zer bkye ba nyid kyis snod du mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: That itself is the meaning, the nature of the result, and the teaching is done by the emission of light rays, because it is done by making a vessel.

original: phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni sku gsum gyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das nyid la'o //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni sku gsum gyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das nyid la'o //
translated: Homage is to the Blessed One himself, who is the nature of the three bodies.

original: bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The Blessed One is as before.

original: phyag rgya chen po brtse bdag nyid //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po brtse bdag nyid //
translated: The Great Seal, the nature of compassion,

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: is said to be

original: stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can 'od gsal ba dang bdag byin gyis brlabs pa dang tha mi dad pa'i sku'i rang bzhin la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can 'od gsal ba dang bdag byin gyis brlabs pa dang tha mi dad pa'i sku'i rang bzhin la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the nature of the body, which is the nature of emptiness and compassion, the nature of clear light and self-consecration, and is without difference.🔽The pure, nondual space

original: dag pa gnyis med mkha' zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dag pa gnyis med mkha' zhes bya ba la /
translated: is said to be🔽the nature of the body, which is the nature of emptiness and compassion, the nature of clear light and self-consecration, and is without difference.

original: @16b dag pa ni rnam par dag pa gnyis kyis so //
analyzed: @16b dag pa ni rnam par dag pa gnyis kyis so //
translated: Pure means by means of the two purities.

original: gnyis su med pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis kyis stong pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis kyis stong pa'o //
translated: Nondual means empty of the duality of subject and object.

original: de nyid ni mkha' ste nam mkha'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni mkha' ste nam mkha'o //
translated: That itself is space, the sky.

original: de la byang chub zla ba ni byang chub kyi ngo bo ri bong gi mtshan ma zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la byang chub zla ba ni byang chub kyi ngo bo ri bong gi mtshan ma zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In that, the moon of enlightenment is the essence of enlightenment, the so-called mark of the hare.

original: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis snod du gyur pa'i slob ma'i bya ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis snod du gyur pa'i slob ma'i bya ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the disciple's duties in two ways,

original: slar yang de'i bya ba brjod pa'i phyir de'i yan lag 'khor gyi dgongs pa shes pa sngon du 'gro bas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: slar yang de'i bya ba brjod pa'i phyir de'i yan lag 'khor gyi dgongs pa shes pa sngon du 'gro bas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: again, in order to state his duties, he says in order to teach the lord of desire, preceded by the understanding of the assembly's intention, with a verse beginning with 'thus,' and so on.

original: sngon du bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bcus so //
analyzed: sngon du bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bcus so //
translated: With the ten verses taught earlier.

original: bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa byas nas zhes bya ba ni bsngags pa byas nas so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa byas nas zhes bya ba ni bsngags pa byas nas so //
translated: Having praised the Blessed One means having made praises.

original: yid la byed pa gcig pas rang gi gdan zla ba dang nyi ma'i ngo bo rnams la 'khod nas 'brel to //
analyzed: yid la byed pa gcig pas rang gi gdan zla ba dang nyi ma'i ngo bo rnams la 'khod nas 'brel to //
translated: Having settled on their own seats, the moon and sun in essence, they are connected by a single mental orientation.

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: What did they do?

original: de'i phyir slar yang 'dus par gyur te zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir slar yang 'dus par gyur te zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “again they gathered together.”

original: bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa po'i dgongs pas gnas gcig tu 'du ba byas nas so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa po'i dgongs pas gnas gcig tu 'du ba byas nas so //
translated: With the intention of supplicating the Bhagavān, they gathered together in one place.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What kind of bodhisattvas?

original: de'i phyir rdo rje phreng ba mngon par brjod pa zhes bya ba ni sa bcu gsum pas bsdus pa la'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje phreng ba mngon par brjod pa zhes bya ba ni sa bcu gsum pas bsdus pa la'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “the vajra-garland recitation,” which is included in the thirteenth stage.

original: ji lta ba'i zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang gis so //
analyzed: ji lta ba'i zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang gis so //
translated: “How” means by what aspect.

original: ngo bo zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin no ;
analyzed: ngo bo zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin no ;
translated: “Essence” means nature.

original: / dri bar 'dod nas zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du'o //
analyzed: / dri bar 'dod nas zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du'o //
translated: “Desiring to ask” means in the presence of the Bhagavān.

original: yid la byed pa gcig pas zhes bya ba ni sems gcig pa ste /
analyzed: yid la byed pa gcig pas zhes bya ba ni sems gcig pa ste /
translated: “By a single mental orientation” means with a single mind.

original: rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud kyi gsol ba 'debs pa la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud kyi gsol ba 'debs pa la'o //
translated: In supplicating the vajra-garland tantra,

original: sems gcig pa zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sems gcig pa zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The phrase “with a single thought” means that they are of the same opinion.

original: shin tu dga' ba byed pa nyid kyi gsung nyan par 'dod nas zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang dga' ba brjod pa ni nyams su myong ba'i bde ba chen po dang rjes su mthun pa'i sgra'o //
analyzed: shin tu dga' ba byed pa nyid kyi gsung nyan par 'dod nas zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang dga' ba brjod pa ni nyams su myong ba'i bde ba chen po dang rjes su mthun pa'i sgra'o //
translated: The phrase “desiring to hear the speech that brings great joy” means that they are eager to hear the speech that brings great joy, which is a sound that is consistent with the great bliss that is experienced.

original: de la dri bar 'dod nas don du gnyer ba la rtse gcig pa'o //
analyzed: de la dri bar 'dod nas don du gnyer ba la rtse gcig pa'o //
translated: The phrase “with a single focus” means that they are intent on asking a question.

original: gzhan yang 'dar ba dang ba spu ldang ba dang dbugs g-yo ba dang bcas pas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dar ba dang ba spu ldang ba dang dbugs g-yo ba dang bcas pas zhes bya ba la /
translated: The phrase “with trembling, with their body hair standing on end, and with their breath coming in gasps” is explained as follows.

original: 'dar ba ni lus thams cad g-yo ba'i rnam pa can no //🔽ba spu ldang ba ni spu langs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dar ba ni lus thams cad g-yo ba'i rnam pa can no // ba spu ldang ba ni spu langs pa'o //
translated: Trembling is a condition in which the entire body shakes.🔽The phrase “with their body hair standing on end” means that their body hair is erect.

original: de dbugs dbyung ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i ngo bo dbugs dbyung ba 'jug pa gang rnams la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o /
analyzed: de dbugs dbyung ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i ngo bo dbugs dbyung ba 'jug pa gang rnams la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o /
translated: The phrase “with their breath coming in gasps” means that they are breathing in a manner that is unusual for them.

original: gzhan yang ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: gzhan yang ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: What else did they do?

original: de'i phyir yang dang yang du bcom ldan 'das la phyag byed ces @17a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir yang dang yang du bcom ldan 'das la phyag byed ces @17a * //
translated: Therefore, he says, “again and again, I bow to the Blessed One.”

original: gsungs te / yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa byas nas so //
analyzed: gsungs te / yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa byas nas so //
translated: Having bowed again and again, and so on,

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la /
translated: he says, “the bodhisattvas.”

original: sangs rgyas rnams dang sa'i snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams dang sa'i snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
translated: The buddhas and the bodhisattvas, such as Ākāśagarbha,

original: rang gi stan la zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: rang gi stan la zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: “on their own seats” as before.

original: sems re dogs dang bcas pas gnas so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems re dogs dang bcas pas gnas so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “They remained with hope and fear”

original: bcom ldan 'das las rgyud nyan pa'i don du gsol ba 'debs par byed pa'i dgongs pas de lta bur sgras brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das las rgyud nyan pa'i don du gsol ba 'debs par byed pa'i dgongs pas de lta bur sgras brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: means that they remained with the intention of requesting the Blessed One to listen to the tantra.

original: gnas so zhes pa ni rnam par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gnas so zhes pa ni rnam par gnas pa'o //
translated: “They remained” means they were present.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni ston pa po'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni ston pa po'o //
translated: “The Blessed One” is the teacher.

original: de rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
translated: “Theirs” refers to the bodhisattvas.

original: de lta bu'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de lta bu'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas zhes bya ba la /
translated: Having known thus the thought of the mind means

original: sems kyi rnam grangs kyi mngon par shes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgongs pa mkhyen nas te /
analyzed: sems kyi rnam grangs kyi mngon par shes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgongs pa mkhyen nas te /
translated: having known the thought of the Bodhisattvas by means of the superknowledge of the categories of mind.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor la rjes su zhugs nas so zhes bya ba dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor la rjes su zhugs nas so zhes bya ba dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: Having entered into the yoga of the Great Seal, means

original: phyag rgya chen po ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa'o //
translated: the Great Seal is the aspect of natural luminosity.

original: de'i sbyor ba ni sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba ni sbyor ba ste /
translated: Its yoga is the practice,

original: shes rab dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: shes rab dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: which has the characteristic of entering into union with the wisdom.

original: de la rjes su zhugs pa ni snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la rjes su zhugs pa ni snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Having entered into that is the meaning of having entered into union.

original: gzhan yang ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: gzhan yang ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: What else did he do?

original: de'i phyir slar yang zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir slar yang zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore it says again,

original: snga ma la ltos pas so //
analyzed: snga ma la ltos pas so //
translated: in dependence on the previous.

original: rdo rje phreng ba mngon par byang chub pa //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba mngon par byang chub pa //
translated: The Vajra Garland is the manifest enlightenment.

original: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad zin to //
translated: Having entered into the samadhi called the vajra of the secret of all Tathagatas, he, the Lord, the Tathagata Akshobya, arose from the vajra samadhi, as was previously explained.

original: gzhan ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: gzhan ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: Having done what else?

original: de'i phyir / gsang ba'i rdo rje las zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / gsang ba'i rdo rje las zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, from the secret vajra.

original: rang nyid kyi thabs kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i sbubs su nub pa las so //
analyzed: rang nyid kyi thabs kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i sbubs su nub pa las so //
translated: From the secret sheath of his own method vajra.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Lord, having emerged from the vajra samadhi,

original: rnam par rtog pa 'joms par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa 'joms par byed pa'o //
translated: having destroyed conceptualization.🔽His own knowledge woman,

original: rang gi rig ma zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
analyzed: rang gi rig ma zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
translated: Vajradhatvi-esvari,

original: phyung ste zhes bya ba ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i ngo bos spros nas so //
analyzed: phyung ste zhes bya ba ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i ngo bos spros nas so //
translated: having emanated her, having expanded her in the form of three faces and six arms.

original: ji lta bus she na /
analyzed: ji lta bus she na /
translated: In what way?

original: de'i phyir sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, endowed with the mood of flirtation, etc.,

original: de la bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu snyoms par 'jug par gnas pas sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de la bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu snyoms par 'jug par gnas pas sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o //
translated: endowed with the mood of flirtation, because she abides in union with the Lord.

original: rnam par rtog pa las mi 'jigs pa nyid kyis dpa' ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa las mi 'jigs pa nyid kyis dpa' ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is heroic because he is fearless in the face of conceptualization.

original: bdud rtsi'i ro myang ba nyid kyis @17b rngam pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i ro myang ba nyid kyis @17b rngam pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is wrathful because he tastes the nectar.

original: drag po'i mtshon cha 'dzin pa nyid kyis drag po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: drag po'i mtshon cha 'dzin pa nyid kyis drag po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is fierce because he wields the fierce weapon.

original: nye bar zhi ba'i bzhad pa'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir bzhad pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar zhi ba'i bzhad pa'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir bzhad pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is laughing because he has the aspect of a laughing peace.

original: bgegs la sogs pa bzlog pa dang bka'i 'khor lo spro ba la yan lag gi dngos po 'gro ba'i phyir 'jigs su rung dang ldan pa'o ;
analyzed: bgegs la sogs pa bzlog pa dang bka'i 'khor lo spro ba la yan lag gi dngos po 'gro ba'i phyir 'jigs su rung dang ldan pa'o ;
translated: He is terrifying because he has the limbs of a body that is sent forth to ward off obstacles and so on and to spread the wheel of the doctrine.

original: / rang bzhin gyis thugs rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir snying rje ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: / rang bzhin gyis thugs rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir snying rje ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is compassionate because he is by nature the essence of great compassion.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sar pa sar pa sprul pa la rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ngo mtshar ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sar pa sar pa sprul pa la rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ngo mtshar ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is wondrous because he is the cause for the emanation of the new and new circles of the mandala.

original: don dam par rnam pa med pa nyid kyi phyir zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: don dam par rnam pa med pa nyid kyi phyir zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He has the experience of peace because he is ultimately without aspects.

original: gzhan yang ci zhig byas nas she na ;
analyzed: gzhan yang ci zhig byas nas she na ;
translated: Moreover, what is done?

original: de phyir bdag nyid kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs spangs nas zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de phyir bdag nyid kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs spangs nas zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, having abandoned the form of one's own passionlessness,

original: bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni rang gis so //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni rang gis so //
translated: one's own means by oneself.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni sh'akya thub pa'i cha byad do //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni sh'akya thub pa'i cha byad do //
translated: The form of passionlessness is the appearance of Sakyamuni.

original: spangs nas zhes bya ba ni mi snang bar byas nas so //
analyzed: spangs nas zhes bya ba ni mi snang bar byas nas so //
translated: Having abandoned means having made invisible.🔽Having taken on the form endowed with the moods of grace, etc.

original: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i gzugs bzung nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag tu bshad zin to //
analyzed: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i gzugs bzung nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag tu bshad zin to //
translated: is as just explained.

original: bcom ldan 'das ji lta bu zhe na /🔽de'i phyir / rang gi rig ma la 'khyud nas //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji lta bu zhe na / de'i phyir / rang gi rig ma la 'khyud nas //
translated: What is the Blessed One like?🔽Therefore, he says,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: embracing his own knowledge woman.

original: 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang lhan cig gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba rjes su thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang lhan cig gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba rjes su thob pa'o //
translated: For the sake of the sentient beings dwelling in the realm of desire, the Blessed One has attained the nondual union with the Lady of the Vajra Realm.

original: de ltar 'khor rnams kyi dgongs pa yongs su shes pa sngon du 'gro bas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bstan par mdzad nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'khor rnams kyi dgongs pa yongs su shes pa sngon du 'gro bas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bstan par mdzad nas /
translated: Having thus taught the lord of desire, having first completely understood the thoughts of the retinue,

original: da ni 'khor rnams la ngo mtshar bskyed pa bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni 'khor rnams la ngo mtshar bskyed pa bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the generation of wonder in the retinue,🔽[the Bhagavān] declares, “Again, they . . .”

original: slar yang de rnams kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: slar yang de rnams kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so on.

original: sngar bstan pa'i cho 'phrul la ltos pas so //
analyzed: sngar bstan pa'i cho 'phrul la ltos pas so //
translated: This is because they are dependent on the previously explained miracles.

original: de rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “They”

original: 'khor na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis so //
analyzed: 'khor na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis so //
translated: refers to the bodhisattvas who are present in the retinue.

original: de lta bu'i zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs spangs nas sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang yang dag par ldan pa'i gzugs can nyid du'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs spangs nas sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang yang dag par ldan pa'i gzugs can nyid du'o //
translated: “Such” refers to the form endowed with the expressions of grace and so on, having abandoned the form of freedom from attachment.

original: mthong ste zhes bya ba ni rnam par gzigs nas te /
analyzed: mthong ste zhes bya ba ni rnam par gzigs nas te /
translated: “Seeing” means having observed.

original: cang mi smra bar gyur nas /
analyzed: cang mi smra bar gyur nas /
translated: Having become silent,

original: de la 'khor rnams yang dag par 'khod par gyur to zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: de la 'khor rnams yang dag par 'khod par gyur to zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: the retinue was perfectly arranged.

original: ngag gis brjod par bya ba nyid du mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽gzhan @18a * //
analyzed: ngag gis brjod par bya ba nyid du mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro // gzhan @18a * //
translated: because it is not possible to express it verbally.

original: yang ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: yang ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: Moreover, how is it?

original: de'i phyir ngo mtshar skyes te /
analyzed: de'i phyir ngo mtshar skyes te /
translated: Therefore, it is said to be “astonishing.”

original: mig gdangs nas zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: mig gdangs nas zhes gsungs te /
translated: “With eyes wide open” is said.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs spangs pa'i ngo mtshar bas mig gdangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs spangs pa'i ngo mtshar bas mig gdangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the eyes are wide open due to the astonishment of abandoning the form of one free from attachment.

original: gang dang 'dra ba zhe na /
analyzed: gang dang 'dra ba zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: de'i phyir ri mor bkod pa lta bu zhes gsungs te ;
analyzed: de'i phyir ri mor bkod pa lta bu zhes gsungs te ;
translated: Therefore, it is said to be “like a painting.”

original: ji ltar rtsig pa la ri mo mkhan gyis bris pa'i skyes pa la sogs pa smra ba dang brjod par mi nus pa de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rtsig pa la ri mo mkhan gyis bris pa'i skyes pa la sogs pa smra ba dang brjod par mi nus pa de bzhin du'o //
translated: Just as a painter’s depiction of a man, etc., on a wall is not able to speak or express itself, so is it.

original: des ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur /
analyzed: des ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur /
translated: This shows the following.

original: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ji ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di lta bu'i dbus su sngon gyi cha lugs yongs su dor nas 'os pa ma yin pa'i sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang yang dag par ldan pa'i gzugs yang dag🔽par blangs nas rnam par zhugs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ji ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di lta bu'i dbus su sngon gyi cha lugs yongs su dor nas 'os pa ma yin pa'i sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang yang dag par ldan pa'i gzugs yang dag par blangs nas rnam par zhugs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The Bhagavat Sakyamuni, who has abandoned all obscurations, how is it that he, having cast aside his former attire, has taken on a form endowed with the experience of improper vanity, etc., and has entered into the midst of such an assembly?

original: yang na de lta bu'i gzugs bstan pa la nges par bcom ldan 'das la dgongs pa'i khyad par 'ga' zhig yod par 'gyur snyam pa'o //
analyzed: yang na de lta bu'i gzugs bstan pa la nges par bcom ldan 'das la dgongs pa'i khyad par 'ga' zhig yod par 'gyur snyam pa'o //
translated: Or else, there must be some special intention of the Bhagavat in displaying such a form.

original: de ltar 'khor rnams la ngo mtshar bskyed pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'khor rnams la ngo mtshar bskyed pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the generation of wonder in the assembly,

original: da ni yi ge gsum spro ba brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni yi ge gsum spro ba brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to speak of the emanation of the three syllables,

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, Then the Bhagavat, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'khor rnams la ngo mtshar bskyed pa bstan ma thag pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'khor rnams la ngo mtshar bskyed pa bstan ma thag pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: Then is immediately after the teaching of the generation of wonder in the assembly.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad zin to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad zin to //
translated: The Blessed One, as explained above,

original: rje btsun rdo rje'i rigs chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: rje btsun rdo rje'i rigs chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: is connected with “this essence of the great vajra family of the venerable one was spoken.”

original: rdo rje chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te stong pa nyid chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te stong pa nyid chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The great vajras are the Tathāgatas, because of the nature of great emptiness.

original: de rnams kyi rigs ni de rnams kyi rgyud do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rigs ni de rnams kyi rgyud do //
translated: Their family is their continuum.

original: de rnams kyi snying po ni skyed par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi snying po ni skyed par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
translated: Their essence is the cause of their generation.

original: rje btsun zhes bya ba ni sngags ma lus pa thams cad la gtso bor gyur pa nyid kyis mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rje btsun zhes bya ba ni sngags ma lus pa thams cad la gtso bor gyur pa nyid kyis mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The venerable one is the one who has great power because of being the chief of all the mantras.

original: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
translated: “Was spoken” means was expressed.

original: ji lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das she na /
analyzed: ji lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das she na /
translated: What kind of Blessed One?

original: rang gi rig mas yang dag par bskul te zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rang gi rig mas yang dag par bskul te zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He is the one “who was implored by his own knowledge consort.”

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas gsol ba 'debs par byed cing bskul pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas gsol ba 'debs par byed cing bskul pa'o //
translated: The Vajraḍākinī makes a request and implores him.

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: What is the reason for that?

original: de'i phyir phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor nye bar bsdus nas snyoms par 'jug pa sngon du 'gro bas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid nyams su myong nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor nye bar bsdus nas snyoms par 'jug pa sngon du 'gro bas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid nyams su myong nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, after the yoga of the great seal is summarized, the meaning of “having experienced the nature of entering into natural luminosity, preceded by meditative union” is stated.

original: gang las @18b she na ;
analyzed: gang las @18b she na ;
translated: From what?

original: de'i phyir de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is stated: “from the vajra body, speech, and mind of that very one.”

original: mgo bo dang / mgrin pa dang snying ga'i gnas rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
analyzed: mgo bo dang / mgrin pa dang snying ga'i gnas rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
translated: In the places of the head, throat, and heart, respectively.

original: yang na nyid kyi sku las gnas brgyad du kun nas re gnas ngag gis de brjod pa'o //
analyzed: yang na nyid kyi sku las gnas brgyad du kun nas re gnas ngag gis de brjod pa'o //
translated: Or, from one’s own body, the eight places are completely pervaded by the speech, which expresses that.

original: sems kyis de bskul ba'o //
analyzed: sems kyis de bskul ba'o //
translated: The mind is the one that impels that.

original: aom a'a:h'um zhes bya ba ni de la don gyis stong pa'i yid ni aom zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: aom a'a:h'um zhes bya ba ni de la don gyis stong pa'i yid ni aom zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Om, āḥ, hūṃ. There, the mind that is empty of meaning is the meaning of “om.”

original: gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos rnams a'a:'i rnam pa'i ngo bo la nye bar mtshon pas yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir a'a: zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos rnams a'a:'i rnam pa'i ngo bo la nye bar mtshon pas yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir a'a: zhes bya'o //
translated: Since the originally unborn dharmas are indicated by the nature of the form of A, it is realized and therefore called A.

original: lus kyang yin la dag kyang yin te /
analyzed: lus kyang yin la dag kyang yin te /
translated: Since it is a body and also pure,

original: yid kyang yin pas na h'um zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyang yin pas na h'um zhes bya'o //
translated: and also a mind, it is called HŪM.

original: de ltar yi ge gsum spro ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar yi ge gsum spro ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the emanation of the three syllables,

original: da ni dkyil 'khor pa spro ba brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni dkyil 'khor pa spro ba brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to describe the emanation of the maṇḍala,

original: de nas de skad gsungs ma thag tu shes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas de skad gsungs ma thag tu shes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said, Then, as soon as that was said...

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum brjod pa'i rjes su'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum brjod pa'i rjes su'o //
translated: Then means after the three syllables are uttered.

original: 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum bcom ldan 'das kyis brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rig ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo'o rgyal po rnams byung bar gyur to zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum bcom ldan 'das kyis brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rig ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo'o rgyal po rnams byung bar gyur to zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: As soon as this was said means that by the Bhagavān's mere utterance of the three syllables, all the tathāgatas, the knowledge consorts, the bodhisattvas, and the wrathful kings arose.

original: thams cad kyang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin pas na /
analyzed: thams cad kyang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin pas na /
translated: Since they are all and also tathāgatas, they are called all tathāgatas.🔽 🔽Knowledge consorts are the mothers of the tathāgatas.🔽 🔽Bodhisattvas are the sons of the tathāgatas.🔽 🔽Wrathful kings are the wrathful ones.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa lnga rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa lnga rnams so //
translated: All the Tathagatas are the five beginning with Akshobhya.

original: rig ma ni lhan cig spyod ma dang rjes su spyod ma'i dbye bas dgu'o //
analyzed: rig ma ni lhan cig spyod ma dang rjes su spyod ma'i dbye bas dgu'o //
translated: The knowledge goddesses are nine, divided into those who act together and those who act subsequently.

original: 'di rnams kyis 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid rig par mdzad pas na rig ma'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid rig par mdzad pas na rig ma'o //
translated: They are knowledge goddesses because they know the reality of clear light.

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad zin to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad zin to //
translated: The Bodhisattvas have been explained previously.

original: sa'i snying po la sogs pa brgyad do //
analyzed: sa'i snying po la sogs pa brgyad do //
translated: The eight are Kshitigarbha and so forth.

original: khro bo'i rgyal po rnams zhes bya ba ni gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa bcu rnams so //
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po rnams zhes bya ba ni gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa bcu rnams so //
translated: The wrathful kings are the ten beginning with Yamantaka.

original: 'di rnams la gnyis ldan gyi bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams la gnyis ldan gyi bsdu ba'o //
translated: This is the combination of the two.

original: phyung bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni byung bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: phyung bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni byung bar gyur pa'o //
translated: They emerged means they came forth.

original: gang nas she na /
analyzed: gang nas she na /
translated: From where?

original: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore it is said: from the body of the Bhagavat.
