original: mchog tu sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa len pa'i sku las so //
analyzed: mchog tu sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa len pa'i sku las so //
translated: From the body which has the appearance of supreme grace.

original: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: From all the pores of his body.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gnas pa'i bu ga rnams las zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽phyung nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gnas pa'i bu ga rnams las zhes bya ba'i don to // phyung nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: From the pores of the Bhagavat's body means from the pores of the body of the Blessed One.🔽Having issued forth means

original: nges par phyung nas so //
analyzed: nges par phyung nas so //
translated: having definitely issued forth.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni ston pa'i'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni ston pa'i'o //
translated: The Bhagavat means the Teacher.

original: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In the east and so forth means

original: shar dang lho dang nub @19a * //
analyzed: shar dang lho dang nub @19a * //
translated: in the east, south, west,🔽and north, and likewise in the southeast, southwest, northwest, northeast, and so forth.

original: dang byang gi phyogs rnams dang / de bzhin du me dang / bden bral dang / rlung dang dpang ldan la sogs pa rnams la mdor bsdus te /
analyzed: dang byang gi phyogs rnams dang / de bzhin du me dang / bden bral dang / rlung dang dpang ldan la sogs pa rnams la mdor bsdus te /
translated: In brief,

original: sgrub thabs su gsungs pa'i rim pas gnas par gyur pa ni bzhugs par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: sgrub thabs su gsungs pa'i rim pas gnas par gyur pa ni bzhugs par gyur pa ste /
translated: the one who abides is the one who is present.

original: zla ba la sogs pa'i gdan rnams la shes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: zla ba la sogs pa'i gdan rnams la shes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: On the seats of the moon and so forth means the rest.

original: rgyas par bshad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyas par bshad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the extensive explanation,

original: kha cig ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnam pa'o zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: kha cig ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnam pa'o zhes gsungs te /
translated: some are the form of Vairochana.

original: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo khyad par du snang bas na /
analyzed: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo khyad par du snang bas na /
translated: Since the mirror-like wisdom appears as a special appearance,

original: rnam par snang mdzad de de'i rnam pa zhal gsum phyag drug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad de de'i rnam pa zhal gsum phyag drug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Vairocana is the aspect of that, meaning having three faces and six arms.

original: kha cig ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnam pas so zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: kha cig ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnam pas so zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Some are in the aspect of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: rin po che ni yid la re ba thams cad skong bar byed pa /
analyzed: rin po che ni yid la re ba thams cad skong bar byed pa /
translated: A jewel fulfills all wishes.

original: sems can rnams la mnyam pa nyid kyis phongs pa'i sdug bsngal 'joms pa gang las 'byung ba de ni rin chen 'byung ldan te /
analyzed: sems can rnams la mnyam pa nyid kyis phongs pa'i sdug bsngal 'joms pa gang las 'byung ba de ni rin chen 'byung ldan te /
translated: It is Ratnasaṃbhava, from which arises the destruction of the suffering of poverty through equality toward sentient beings.

original: de'i rnam pa zhes bya ba sngon bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa zhes bya ba sngon bzhin no //
translated: Its aspect is as before.🔽Some are in the aspect of Amitābha.

original: kha cig ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnam pa'o zhes bya ba ni dpag tu med pa ni gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: kha cig ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnam pa'o zhes bya ba ni dpag tu med pa ni gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: Amitābha is immeasurable.

original: 'od ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: 'od ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa'o //
translated: Light is the aspect of the wisdom of discernment.

original: de gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which has that is so-called.

original: kha cig ni gnod mdzes rgyal po dang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i bar gyi rnam pa'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan rnams kyang bar du bsdus nas gsungs pa'o ;
analyzed: kha cig ni gnod mdzes rgyal po dang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i bar gyi rnam pa'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan rnams kyang bar du bsdus nas gsungs pa'o ;
translated: Some say that the form is from Sumbharāja to Uṣṇīṣa Cakravartin. This is said by including others in between.

original: / dbang po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba 'bigs par byed pas na gnod mdzes so //
analyzed: / dbang po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba 'bigs par byed pas na gnod mdzes so //
translated: Sumbha means “piercing” the world protectors such as Indra.

original: de nyid kyi ngo bos gsal bar byed pas na gnod mdzes rgyal po'o //🔽gtsug tor lag pa gnyis kyis bzung nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i steng du gnas pas na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi ngo bos gsal bar byed pas na gnod mdzes rgyal po'o // gtsug tor lag pa gnyis kyis bzung nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i steng du gnas pas na /
translated: Sumbharāja means “piercing king” by the nature of that.

original: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
analyzed: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
translated: Uṣṇīṣa Cakravartin means “holding the uṣṇīṣa with both hands and standing above the maṇḍala wheel.”

original: de'i rnam pa ni de'i ngo bos so zhes bya ba'i sgra ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshams sbyor ro //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa ni de'i ngo bos so zhes bya ba'i sgra ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshams sbyor ro //
translated: The form is by the nature of that. The word “also” is a complete transition.

original: de ltar rgyas bar bshad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rgyas bar bshad pa bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the extensive version in that way,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas skabs gzhan brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas skabs gzhan brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to describe another situation of the Bhagavān,

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then the Bhagavān, etc.”

original: dkyil 'khor pa rnams rang rang gi stan la 'khod pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor pa rnams rang rang gi stan la 'khod pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: After the maṇḍala deities have taken their seats on their respective seats.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa ni sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa ni sngar bzhin no //
translated: The Blessed One’s explanation is as before.

original: yud tsam zhig ces bya ba ni skad cig tsam mo //
analyzed: yud tsam zhig ces bya ba ni skad cig tsam mo //
translated: “For a moment” means for an instant.

original: cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni mi smra bar ro //
analyzed: cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni mi smra bar ro //
translated: “Sat without speaking” means without speaking.

original: bzhugs pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sgra brjod pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: bzhugs pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sgra brjod pa'i don du'o //
translated: “Sat” is for the purpose of expressing the sound that will be explained.

original: ji ltar don gsum @19b gyis dkyil 'khor pa rnams spro ba bstan nas /
analyzed: ji ltar don gsum @19b gyis dkyil 'khor pa rnams spro ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the maṇḍala deities’ delight with the three topics,

original: da ni gsol ba 'debs pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni gsol ba 'debs pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to state the supplication,

original: de'i yan lag tu gyur ba 'khor rnams kyi bya ba brjod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i yan lag tu gyur ba 'khor rnams kyi bya ba brjod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the activity of the retinue that is a branch of that,🔽[IV]

original: ji snyed kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ji snyed kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “all” refers to those enumerated and those not enumerated.

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'khor gyi ngo bos gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'khor gyi ngo bos gnas pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas abide with the essence of the retinue of the bhagavān.

original: thams cad kyis zhes bya ba ni bgrangs pa dang ma bgrangs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyis zhes bya ba ni bgrangs pa dang ma bgrangs pa'o //
translated: “All” refers to those enumerated and those not enumerated.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni nam mkha'i khams khyab pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni nam mkha'i khams khyab pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas pervade the element of space.

original: dbyangs gcig gis zhes bya ba ni mgrin gcig gis so //🔽dbyangs kyis smras pa zhes bya ba ni /🔽ae ma'o rdo rje rigs chen po //
analyzed: dbyangs gcig gis zhes bya ba ni mgrin gcig gis so // dbyangs kyis smras pa zhes bya ba ni / ae ma'o rdo rje rigs chen po //
translated: With one voice means with one throat.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sgra brjod par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sgra brjod par gyur pa'o //
translated: The sound is the sound of the words that will be explained, Emaho! The great vajra family!

original: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba la'o //🔽rdo rje rigs chen po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba la'o // rdo rje rigs chen po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Emaho! means astonishing!.🔽The great vajra family is the lineage of the great vajra.

original: rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: The great vajra is Vajradhara.

original: de'i rigs ni de'i rgyud do //
analyzed: de'i rigs ni de'i rgyud do //
translated: His lineage is his tantra.

original: de'i bod pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i bod pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The invocation of that is called that.

original: rdo rje theg pa zhes bya ba nis ngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sngags kyi theg pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa zhes bya ba nis ngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sngags kyi theg pa'o //
translated: The vajra vehicle is the mantra vehicle that has the characteristic of being explained.

original: de'i don ni rim pa gnyis la brten nas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i don ni rim pa gnyis la brten nas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'o //
translated: Its meaning is the accomplishment of mundane and supramundane powers based on the two stages.

original: de mdzad pa ni ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de mdzad pa ni ston par byed pa'o //
translated: That is performed, which is taught.

original: de bzhin du ae ma'o zhes bya ba sngon bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du ae ma'o zhes bya ba sngon bzhin no //
translated: Similarly, Emaho! is as before.

original: rdo rje theg pa gsal zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa gsal zhes bya ba la /
translated: The clarity of the vajra vehicle is the clarity of the vajra vehicle.

original: rdo rje theg pa ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
translated: The Vajra Vehicle is as was just explained.

original: de la gsal ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag po'i rkyen gyis de bsgrub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de la gsal ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag po'i rkyen gyis de bsgrub pa'i phyir //
translated: Therein, the clear is the Blessed One, because he is the dominant condition for the accomplishment of that.🔽He is the antidote to the darkness of conceptual thought.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i mun pa rnams kyi gnyen po nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro// chos kyi dbyings kyi don mdzad ces bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings thog ma dang tha ma med pa nyid kyi rigs so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i mun pa rnams kyi gnyen po nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro// chos kyi dbyings kyi don mdzad ces bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings thog ma dang tha ma med pa nyid kyi rigs so //
translated: The meaning of the Dharma realm is the lineage of the beginningless and endless Dharma realm.

original: de nyid ni don te thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis don du gnyer bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni don te thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis don du gnyer bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That itself is the meaning, because it is sought by those who desire liberation.🔽He teaches that, because he teaches that reality by means of various elaborations.

original: de ston par mdzad pa ni spros pa sna tshogs pa'i sgo nas de nyid ston par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes lan gsum brjod nas zhes bya ba ni de lta bur gyur pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: de ston par mdzad pa ni spros pa sna tshogs pa'i sgo nas de nyid ston par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes lan gsum brjod nas zhes bya ba ni de lta bur gyur pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: Having spoken thus three times, means having spoken such verses three times.

original: gsum ni lan gsum du'o //
analyzed: gsum ni lan gsum du'o //
translated: Three is three times.

original: brjod nas zhes bya ba ni smras nas so //
analyzed: brjod nas zhes bya ba ni smras nas so //
translated: Having spoken means having said.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po de la zhes bya ba ni gang gis sngar gsungs pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa de nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po de la zhes bya ba ni gang gis sngar gsungs pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa de nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
translated: To that Great Vajradhara means to him who previously displayed the miracle.

original: stong pa nyid chen po 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid chen po 'chang ba'o //
translated: He is the Great Vajradhara because he holds the great emptiness.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Blessed One means

original: rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o //🔽de ltar tshig gnyis po 'dis ye shes dang spangs pa phun sum @20a * //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o // de ltar tshig gnyis po 'dis ye shes dang spangs pa phun sum @20a * //
translated: he is the one who destroys all conceptual thoughts.

original: tshogs pa bstan to //
analyzed: tshogs pa bstan to //
translated: Thus, these two words indicate the perfection of wisdom and abandonment.

original: phyag byas nas zhes bya ba ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor phyag la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: phyag byas nas zhes bya ba ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor phyag la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: Having bowed means with the body, the maṇḍala, and so on.

original: rang rang gi stan la shes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang rang gi stan la shes bya ba ni /
translated: To their own seats means

original: zla ba dang nyi ma dang padma'i gdan la sogs pa rnams la'o //🔽'dug par gyur to zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma dang padma'i gdan la sogs pa rnams la'o // 'dug par gyur to zhes bya ba ni /
translated: on the seats of the moon, sun, and lotus, and so on.🔽They sat down means

original: bzhugs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bzhugs par gyur pa'o //
translated: they were seated.

original: de ltar 'khor rnams kyi bya ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'khor rnams kyi bya ba bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the activities of the retinue,

original: gsol ba 'debs pa rtsom pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gsol ba 'debs pa rtsom pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the beginning of the supplication,🔽it says:

original: de nas de'i tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas de'i tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, at that time, etc.

original: 'khor rnams rang rang gi stan la 'khod pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: 'khor rnams rang rang gi stan la 'khod pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: After the retinue had sat down on their respective seats.

original: skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la zhes bya ba ni /🔽skad cig se gol gtogs pa tsam //
analyzed: skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la zhes bya ba ni / skad cig se gol gtogs pa tsam //
translated: In that instant, in that moment, in that very short time, etc.🔽An instant is the time of a finger snap.

original: thang cig yungs kar sgril ba ste //
analyzed: thang cig yungs kar sgril ba ste //
translated: A moment is the time of a mustard seed falling.

original: dbugs 'byung yud tsam zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dbugs 'byung yud tsam zhes bya'o //
translated: A short time is the time of an exhalation.

original: zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyis te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyis te /
translated: This is the definition.

original: phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: It is connected with “Then Vajrapāṇi said to the Lord: ”

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: What did he do?

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor 'dul ba chen po de rnams mthong nas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor 'dul ba chen po de rnams mthong nas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, having seen those great bodhisattva-mahāsattva retinues, etc.

original: gnas gcig tu 'dus pa gzigs nas so //
analyzed: gnas gcig tu 'dus pa gzigs nas so //
translated: Having seen them gathered in one place.

original: de'i phyir rgya chen po zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgya chen po zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, “great” is stated.

original: grangs la sogs pa rnams kyis bcad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grangs la sogs pa rnams kyis bcad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are not limited by number, etc.

original: de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa la rtsom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa la rtsom pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the composition of the supplication,

original: da ni dngos su gsol ba 'debs pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni dngos su gsol ba 'debs pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to actually state the supplication,

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, “Bhagavat,” etc.

original: ye shes gsum dang lhan cig tu gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshogs spangs pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das de la bod pa gang yin pa de yang de skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: ye shes gsum dang lhan cig tu gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshogs spangs pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das de la bod pa gang yin pa de yang de skad ces brjod do //
translated: Because of the abandonment of the assembly of the nature of the three intuitions, the Bhagavat is so called.

original: ye shes rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya ba la ;
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya ba la ;
translated: The intuition-vajra-sun

original: ye shes ni ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: ye shes ni ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do //
translated: is the nature of the five intuitions.

original: de'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje ni ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje ni ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
translated: The intuition-vajra is the nature of that.

original: de nyid ni nyi ma ste de'i 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ye shes rdo rje'i nyi ma'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni nyi ma ste de'i 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ye shes rdo rje'i nyi ma'o //
translated: That itself is the sun, because it is the result of the intuition-vajra.

original: 'bras bu de nyid gsungs pa nas //
analyzed: 'bras bu de nyid gsungs pa nas //
translated: The result itself is stated:

original: gsang ba'i padma rab rgyas pa //🔽zhes bya ba ste /🔽gsang ba'i rnam pa'i snying ga'i padma'am /
analyzed: gsang ba'i padma rab rgyas pa // zhes bya ba ste / gsang ba'i rnam pa'i snying ga'i padma'am /
translated: the fully blossomed secret lotus.🔽The secret lotus is the heart lotus.

original: gsang ba ni snying ga mtshon pa'i padma'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni snying ga mtshon pa'i padma'o //
translated: The secret is the lotus of the heart.

original: rab tu rgyas par byed pa ni kha 'byed pa ste /
analyzed: rab tu rgyas par byed pa ni kha 'byed pa ste /
translated: The one who causes expansion is the one who opens the mouth.

original: de gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He who has that is so called.

original: dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The one called “great commitment”

original: dbang bzhi pa'i dus su dam tshig chen po lnga ster ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang bzhi pa'i dus su dam tshig chen po lnga ster ba'i phyir ro //
translated: is so called because at the time of the fourth initiation he bestows the five great commitments.

original: rnal 'byor dbang zhes bya ba ni /🔽rim pa gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin la brten @20b nas ;
analyzed: rnal 'byor dbang zhes bya ba ni / rim pa gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin la brten @20b nas ;
translated: The one called “lord of yogins”

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is so called because he is the one who accomplishes the state of Great Vajradhara in dependence on the meditative stabilization of the two stages.

original: bdag gi zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje bdag gi tshig gsol ba 'debs pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: bdag gi zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje bdag gi tshig gsol ba 'debs pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The one called “my” is the essence of the request of Vajrapani.

original: gson cig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: gson cig ces bya ba ni /
translated: The one called “listen”

original: rno ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rno ba nyid kyis so //
translated: is so called because of sharpness.

original: thugs rje zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mtshan nyid can las so //
analyzed: thugs rje zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mtshan nyid can las so //
translated: The one called “compassion” is so called because of the activity which has the character of benefit and happiness for all sentient beings and the highest intention.

original: tshig gi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: tshig gi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to teach the essence of the words,🔽the root text says,

original: bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams //
analyzed: bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams //
translated: “The buddhas of the fortunate eon”

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: and so forth.

original: bskal pa bzang po ni /
analyzed: bskal pa bzang po ni /
translated: The Fortunate Aeon is

original: tshe ring ba nyid dang shes rab rno ba nyid kyis rdzogs ldan gyi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: tshe ring ba nyid dang shes rab rno ba nyid kyis rdzogs ldan gyi ngo bo ste /
translated: the nature of the Satya Yuga, because of the longevity and sharpness of the wisdom of beings.

original: dus gang la 'bras bu bzhi po yongs su rdzogs pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur ba dang ; gang yang rang nyid kyis 'bum phrag nyi shu'i tshad dang ldan pa de la 'byung bas na bskal pa bzang po'o //
analyzed: dus gang la 'bras bu bzhi po yongs su rdzogs pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur ba dang ; gang yang rang nyid kyis 'bum phrag nyi shu'i tshad dang ldan pa de la 'byung bas na bskal pa bzang po'o //
translated: It is the Fortunate Aeon because it is the aeon in which the four fruits are accomplished, and because it is the aeon in which the human lifespan is twenty thousand years.

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Fully Enlightened Buddhas are

original: sngon gyi rnam par gzigs la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sngon gyi rnam par gzigs la sogs pa ste /
translated: Vipaśyin and so forth.

original: yongs su rdzogs pa dang chos thams cad yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa dang chos thams cad yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are fully enlightened because they have fully realized all phenomena.

original: rdo rje'i theg pa la mngon par dad pa zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi theg pa la dad pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i theg pa la mngon par dad pa zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi theg pa la dad pa'o //
translated: Those who have faith in the Vajra Vehicle are those who have faith in the Mantra Vehicle.

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni rnam par gzigs la sogs pa de nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor rnams nyid du gnas pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni rnam par gzigs la sogs pa de nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor rnams nyid du gnas pa ste /
translated: The Bodhisattvas are Vipaśyin and so forth, who abide as the retinue of the Blessed One, Great Vajradhara.

original: slob bzhin pa nyid kyi ngo bos gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: slob bzhin pa nyid kyi ngo bos gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of abiding in the nature of being a learner.

original: sems dpa' che zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems dpa' che zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Great being means

original: sems can thams cad kyi don la dgongs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don la dgongs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the intention to benefit all sentient beings.

original: 'di rnams zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du ston par byed do //
analyzed: 'di rnams zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du ston par byed do //
translated: These means that they are directly perceived.

original: lus kyis phyag 'tshal 'khod ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: lus kyis phyag 'tshal 'khod ces bya ba ni /
translated: Having bowed down with their bodies, they sat down means

original: ston pa la gus pas lus btud pa'o //
analyzed: ston pa la gus pas lus btud pa'o //
translated: that they bowed their bodies out of respect for the Teacher.

original: lus ni gang rnams la btud pa de ni lus btud pa'o //
analyzed: lus ni gang rnams la btud pa de ni lus btud pa'o //
translated: The body is that which is bowed down to, and that is bowing down with the body.

original: snyigs ma lnga'i dus su zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: snyigs ma lnga'i dus su zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In the time of the five degenerations means

original: tshe dang / lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / bskal pa dang / sems can gyi snyigs ma'i mtshan nyid can rtsod pa'i dus kyi ming can la'o //
analyzed: tshe dang / lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / bskal pa dang / sems can gyi snyigs ma'i mtshan nyid can rtsod pa'i dus kyi ming can la'o //
translated: in the time called the time of strife, which is characterized by the degenerations of life span, view, afflictions, eon, and sentient beings.

original: da ltar yang dag 'jug pa la //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: da ltar yang dag 'jug pa la // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Now, engaging in the true nature means🔽that they engaged in the true nature.

original: yang dag 'jug pa la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yang dag 'jug pa la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Engaging in the true nature means

original: sems can rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis 'jug pa la'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis 'jug pa la'o //
translated: engaging in the power of the karma of sentient beings.

original: da ltar zhes bya ba ni da ltar gyi dus so //
analyzed: da ltar zhes bya ba ni da ltar gyi dus so //
translated: Now means in the present time.

original: ci'i don du snyigs ma lnga'i dus su gnas she na /
analyzed: ci'i don du snyigs ma lnga'i dus su gnas she na /
translated: For what purpose does he dwell in the time of the five degenerations?

original: de'i phyir sems can rnams zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sems can rnams zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, he says, “sentient beings”

original: sems can zhes bya ba ni srog chags rnams so //
analyzed: sems can zhes bya ba ni srog chags rnams so //
translated: “Sentient beings” are living beings.

original: bsod nams chung ba zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsod nams chung ba zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “Having little merit” means having very little root of virtue.
Likewise,

original: bzhin du / brtson 'grus chung zhing tshe thung dang // zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bzhin du / brtson 'grus chung zhing tshe thung dang // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “having little effort, short life”

original: brtson 'grus chung ba ni dge ba'i las la spro ba'i mtshan nyid shas chung ba'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus chung ba ni dge ba'i las la spro ba'i mtshan nyid shas chung ba'o //
translated: “Having little effort” means having little of the nature of enthusiasm for virtuous actions.

original: tshe ni lo'i grangs tshad gang rnams la yod pa de rnams la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: tshe ni lo'i grangs tshad gang rnams la yod pa de rnams la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: “Life” is that which has the measure of years.

original: lte ba ngan pa mang po dang // zhes bya ba ni sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa 'debs pa'i mtshan nyid can mu stegs pa la sogs pa'i lta ba'i rang bzhin log par lta ba la ltung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lte ba ngan pa mang po dang // zhes bya ba ni sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa 'debs pa'i mtshan nyid can mu stegs pa la sogs pa'i lta ba'i rang bzhin log par lta ba la ltung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “Many bad views” means falling into wrong views, which have the nature of the views of tīrthikas, etc., characterized by superimposition and denial.

original: dgos phyir zhes bya ba ni de'i rgyu mtshan du'o //
analyzed: dgos phyir zhes bya ba ni de'i rgyu mtshan du'o //
translated: For the sake of that is the reason for that.

original: de rnams kyi lta ba ngan pa bzlog pa'i gnas pa zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: de rnams kyi lta ba ngan pa bzlog pa'i gnas pa zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: That is connected with the abode of the reversal of their bad views.

original: mchog gi go 'phang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mchog gi go 'phang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The state of supreme bliss is

original: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bzlog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje 'chang chan po'i go 'phang ngo //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bzlog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje 'chang chan po'i go 'phang ngo //
translated: the state of Great Vajradhara, which is characterized by the reversal of the suffering of cyclic existence.

original: zhu zhes bya ba ni ston pa po'i drung nas so //
analyzed: zhu zhes bya ba ni ston pa po'i drung nas so //
translated: To request is from the teacher.

original: gang gis zhes bya ba ni mchog gi go 'phang gis so //
analyzed: gang gis zhes bya ba ni mchog gi go 'phang gis so //
translated: By which is by the state of supreme bliss.

original: myur du zhes bya ba ni skye ba 'di nyid la'o //
analyzed: myur du zhes bya ba ni skye ba 'di nyid la'o //
translated: Quickly is in this very life.

original: 'khor ba las zhes bya ba ni khams gsum gyi ngo bo las so //
analyzed: 'khor ba las zhes bya ba ni khams gsum gyi ngo bo las so //
translated: From cyclic existence is from the nature of the three realms.

original: thar pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: thar pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Liberation is

original: nyon mongs pa dang kun nas sbyor ba bral ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang kun nas sbyor ba bral ba'o //
translated: freedom from afflictions and fetters.

original: 'gyur zhes bya ba ni grol bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: 'gyur zhes bya ba ni grol bar 'gyur ba ste /
translated: Will come about is will be liberated.

original: thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is will be attained.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said to be the perfection.

original: nyan thos kyi byang chub la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba la'o //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi byang chub la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba la'o //
translated: who are free from the characteristics of the enlightenment of the śrāvakas and so forth.

original: yang na bsdus nas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i spyod pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yang na bsdus nas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i spyod pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Or else, “in brief” means “by means of the enjoyment of the five sense objects.”

original: ma 'ongs pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “In the future” means

original: 'byung bar gyur pa'i dus rnams la'o //
analyzed: 'byung bar gyur pa'i dus rnams la'o //
translated: in the times that will come.

original: sems can rnams zhes bya ba ni lus bzung ba rnams la'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams zhes bya ba ni lus bzung ba rnams la'o //
translated: “Sentient beings” means those who have taken up bodies.

original: 'di dag la zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du mthong bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag la zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du mthong bzhin pa'o //
translated: “These” means those who are seen directly.

original: rgyal ba'i sras zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' ste /
translated: “The Victor’s sons” are the bodhisattvas,

original: slob bzhin pa'i rgyu mtshan du'o //
analyzed: slob bzhin pa'i rgyu mtshan du'o //
translated: who are the reason for the training.

original: bdud bzhi 'joms par byed pas na rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: bdud bzhi 'joms par byed pas na rgyal ba'o //
translated: “The Victor” is one who conquers, because he conquers the four māras.

original: sras rnams ni bu rnams so //
analyzed: sras rnams ni bu rnams so //
translated: “Sons” are the children.

original: bdag ni zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: bdag ni zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
translated: “I” is Vajrapāṇi.

original: gsol ba 'debs zhes bya ba ni zhu ba byed pa'o ;
analyzed: gsol ba 'debs zhes bya ba ni zhu ba byed pa'o ;
translated: “I request” means “I ask.”

original: /'di ltar zhes bya ba ni 'chad bzhin pa'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: /'di ltar zhes bya ba ni 'chad bzhin pa'i tshul gyis so //
translated: “In this way” means in the manner that is being explained.

original: gang la zhe na /
analyzed: gang la zhe na /
translated: “To whom?”

original: de'i phyir rdo rje 'chang chen la //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje 'chang chen la //
translated: Therefore, to Vajradhara,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: To Vajradhara means

original: stong nyid chen po 'dzin pa'i ston pa po la'o //
analyzed: stong nyid chen po 'dzin pa'i ston pa po la'o //
translated: to the teacher who holds the great emptiness.

original: gtso bo zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas lnga'i bdag po la'o //
analyzed: gtso bo zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas lnga'i bdag po la'o //
translated: The chief means the lord of the five buddhas.

original: 'o na ji @21b ltar ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don nam slob bzhin pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du gsol ba 'debs pa zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji @21b ltar ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don nam slob bzhin pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du gsol ba 'debs pa zhe na /
translated: But how is it that he prays for the sake of future sentient beings or for the sake of sentient beings who are still learning?

original: de'i phyir de nyid mchog ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid mchog ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, he says the supreme reality, etc.

original: phyag na rdo rjes so //🔽de nyid mchog ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rjes so // de nyid mchog ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Vajrapani.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The supreme reality is the nature of the great seal, which is the aspect of natural luminosity.

original: 'tshal ba zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'tshal ba zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'o //
translated: To know means to realize.

original: khyed drin gyis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: khyed drin gyis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By your kindness means

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag po'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag po'i dbang gis so //
translated: by the power of the lord of great Vajradhara.

original: 'gro ba'i gtso bo zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das la bod pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i gtso bo zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das la bod pa'o //
translated: The chief of migrating beings is the Blessed One.

original: 'gro ba ni g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can gyi khams gsum pa'i bdag po'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba ni g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can gyi khams gsum pa'i bdag po'o //
translated: Migrating beings are the lords of the three realms, who have the nature of movement.

original: de nyid mchog ni ji lta bu zhe na /🔽de'i phyir gsang ba'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid mchog ni ji lta bu zhe na / de'i phyir gsang ba'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: What is the supreme of those?🔽 Therefore, he says secret,

original: sba bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: sba bar bya ba'o //
translated: which is to be concealed.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba ni /
translated: All buddhas

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la'o //
translated: means the perfect buddhas who are free from desire.

original: gzhan yang / rgyud rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa //
analyzed: gzhan yang / rgyud rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa //
translated: Moreover, the meaning of all tantras is summarized

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: rgyud lnga po rnams sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyud lnga po rnams sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that the five tantras are summarized.

original: 'o na gal te khyod kyis de nyid mchog 'tshal na /
analyzed: 'o na gal te khyod kyis de nyid mchog 'tshal na /
translated: If you know that supreme reality,

original: de'i phyir mi smra ba'i ngo bos khyod la gnas par 'os she na /🔽de phyir 'on kyang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mi smra ba'i ngo bos khyod la gnas par 'os she na / de phyir 'on kyang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: then it is fitting for you to abide in the state of silence.🔽 Therefore, he says nevertheless,

original: de la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: and there means

original: de nyid mchog bstan pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa 'dri bar 'tshal zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //🔽rdo rje phreng bas thob par bya'i mngon par rtogs pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid mchog bstan pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa 'dri bar 'tshal zhes bya ba dang 'brel to // rdo rje phreng bas thob par bya'i mngon par rtogs pa ni /
translated: The request is connected with the statement, I wish to ask about the Vajra-garland clear realization in the glorious Guhyasamaja, which has the characteristic of teaching that very supreme reality.🔽The Vajra-garland clear realization is to be attained.

original: rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa ste /
translated: The Vajra-garland clear realization is that which is to be attained.

original: 'di'i don sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di'i don sngar bshad zin to //
translated: Its meaning has been explained above.

original: ji ltar dri bar 'dod ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar dri bar 'dod ce na /
translated: How is it to be asked?

original: de'i phyir don dam par ni zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir don dam par ni zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ultimately.

original: khyad par du 'phags pa'i don gyi ngo bos so //
analyzed: khyad par du 'phags pa'i don gyi ngo bos so //
translated: By the nature of the meaning that is superior.

original: ji lta bu zhe na de'i rim pa gnyis ni bla na med pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na de'i rim pa gnyis ni bla na med pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: What is it like? It is said, its two stages are unsurpassed.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bla na med pa ste /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bla na med pa ste /
translated: Unsurpassed by the characteristics of the generation stage and completion stage.

original: 'di las gong du bla na med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di las gong du bla na med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is nothing higher than this.

original: de ltar na de lta bu de nyid bstan du gsol zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: de ltar na de lta bu de nyid bstan du gsol zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: Thus, it is connected with the statement, please teach that very suchness.

original: ji ltar zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ni//🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ni// zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The yoga of the completion stage🔽is the meaning of the vajra-essence.

original: zla ba dang rdo rje la sogs pa dor ba'i ro bo rang bzhin gyis nye bar mtshon pa'i ngo bos zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zla ba dang rdo rje la sogs pa dor ba'i ro bo rang bzhin gyis nye bar mtshon pa'i ngo bos zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the essence of the vajra-essence is the essence that is naturally indicated by the abandonment of the moon, vajra, and so on.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i don bstan pa la /🔽khyod kyis bdag la bstan du gsol //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i don bstan pa la / khyod kyis bdag la bstan du gsol //
translated: In the teaching of such a meaning,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: it is said:🔽Please teach it to me.

original: phyag na rdo rje bdag la'o //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje bdag la'o //
translated: To me is to Vajrapani.

original: bstan du gsol zhes bya ba ni mdzad du gsol @22a * //
analyzed: bstan du gsol zhes bya ba ni mdzad du gsol @22a * //
translated: Please teach is to please do it.

original: ba'o ; / mtshon pa zhes bya ba ni don gsal ba nyid kyis gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ba'o ; / mtshon pa zhes bya ba ni don gsal ba nyid kyis gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Indicated is because it is made clear by the clarity of the meaning.

original: dpal ldan 'dus pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dpal ldan 'dus pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Glorious is

original: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag nyid can la ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag nyid can la ste /
translated: the nature of the gathering of all buddhas.

original: de la phyi rol du rgyud bstan pa'i gnas skabs su ni rtsa ba'i 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: de la phyi rol du rgyud bstan pa'i gnas skabs su ni rtsa ba'i 'dus pa'o //
translated: There, in the context of teaching the tantra externally, it is the root gathering.

original: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag la yang gdams ngag ji lta bar 'dus pa'i don shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag la yang gdams ngag ji lta bar 'dus pa'i don shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand the meaning of the Compendium in accordance with the instructions in the creation and perfection stages.

original: dpal ni tshogs gnyis so //
analyzed: dpal ni tshogs gnyis so //
translated: Sri is the two stores.

original: de gtso bor byas pa'i 'dus pa ni 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: de gtso bor byas pa'i 'dus pa ni 'dus pa'o //
translated: The Compendium is the assembly that has those as its principal matter.

original: de nyid ni rgyud sde dang rgyu dang 'bras bu dang thabs kyi rgyud kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir rgyud de /
analyzed: de nyid ni rgyud sde dang rgyu dang 'bras bu dang thabs kyi rgyud kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir rgyud de /
translated: It is a tantra because it is the nature of the tantras of cause, result, and means.

original: de la de ston pa la'o ;
analyzed: de la de ston pa la'o ;
translated: It is taught in that way.

original: / ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: / ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: de'i phyir rnal 'byor bla na med //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnal 'byor bla na med //
translated: Therefore, it is the unexcelled yoga.

original: ces gsungs te /
analyzed: ces gsungs te /
translated: It is said:🔽The yoga is called

original: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas //🔽rnal 'byor zhes su brjod pa yin //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas // rnal 'byor zhes su brjod pa yin //
translated: the union of means and wisdom.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshig gi rnal 'byor gyi sgras ni dpal de kho na nyid 'dus pa la sogs pa la rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams su brjod do//
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshig gi rnal 'byor gyi sgras ni dpal de kho na nyid 'dus pa la sogs pa la rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams su brjod do//
translated: The word yoga is expressed in the yoga tantras such as the glorious Compendium of Principles.

original: de rnams kyi bla na med pa la rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi ngo bo la zhes bya bar brjod do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bla na med pa la rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi ngo bo la zhes bya bar brjod do //
translated: The unexcelled among those is the nature of the unexcelled yoga tantras.

original: gzhan yang ji lta bu zhen de'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan yang ji lta bu zhen de'i phyir //
translated: Moreover, how is it so?

original: brgyad khri dang ni pa zhi stong ngo //
analyzed: brgyad khri dang ni pa zhi stong ngo //
translated: It is said that there are 84,000.

original: brgyad khri bzhi stong ni nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brgyad khri bzhi stong ni nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There are 84,000 because they are the antidotes to the 84,000 afflictions.

original: chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba ni gro ga'i shun pa gcig pa la nyag ma'i tshad kyi smyu gus bris pa khur ji tsam du glang po che smyon pa dar la bab pas khur bar nus pa de tsam gyi tshad ni chos kyi phung po gcig go
analyzed: chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba ni gro ga'i shun pa gcig pa la nyag ma'i tshad kyi smyu gus bris pa khur ji tsam du glang po che smyon pa dar la bab pas khur bar nus pa de tsam gyi tshad ni chos kyi phung po gcig go
translated: The so-called aggregate of Dharma is the amount of Dharma that can be written with a pen the size of a louse egg on a single birch bark page, and the amount that can be carried by a mature, wild elephant.

original: // des bsdus pa'i ngo bo dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la'o //
analyzed: // des bsdus pa'i ngo bo dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la'o //
translated: The essence that is included in that is the glorious Guhyasamaja.

original: de ltar yang bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa'i rjes su dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas lnga'i dam tshig dang / dbang lnga dang / rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang mtha' dag ma lus pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar yang bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa'i rjes su dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas lnga'i dam tshig dang / dbang lnga dang / rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang mtha' dag ma lus pa dang /
translated: In that way, after the vows of one-day fasting, going for refuge to the Three Jewels, generating the mind of enlightenment, the commitments of the five buddhas, the five initiations, and all of the initiations of the vajra master without exception,

original: de skad smras nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de skad smras nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Having said this,

original: de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa rang gi ngo bos bstan nas so //
analyzed: de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa rang gi ngo bos bstan nas so //
translated: having thus requested with his own nature.

original: mdun du 'dug ste zhes bya ba ni mdun du 'khod pa'i phyag na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: mdun du 'dug ste zhes bya ba ni mdun du 'khod pa'i phyag na rdo rje'o //
translated: Sitting in front,

original: phyag ni byas nas kyang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phyag ni byas nas kyang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: having made obeisance,

original: bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur dang gus pa sngon du 'gro bas gsol ba 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur dang gus pa sngon du 'gro bas gsol ba 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: having made obeisance to the Blessed One with respect and reverence, he requested.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One is the Tathagata.

original: smras nas zhes bya ba ni brjod nas so//
analyzed: smras nas zhes bya ba ni brjod nas so//
translated: Having said is having spoken.

original: @22b ji lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das she na /
analyzed: @22b ji lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das she na /
translated: What kind of Blessed One?

original: de'i phyir ye shes chen po zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir ye shes chen po zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said to be of great wisdom,

original: shes pa dang shes bya thams cad ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa dang shes bya thams cad ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all knowledge and objects of knowledge are non-apprehended.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Vajrasattva is

original: sra zhing snying po khong stong med //🔽mi chod mi shigs mtshan nyid ldan //
analyzed: sra zhing snying po khong stong med // mi chod mi shigs mtshan nyid ldan //
translated: hard, with an essence, without hollowness,

original: mi 'tshig pa dang mi nyams pa'i ;
analyzed: mi 'tshig pa dang mi nyams pa'i ;
translated: having the characteristic of uncuttability and indivisibility,🔽not burning, not decaying,

original: / stong nyid rdo rje zhes brjod do //
analyzed: / stong nyid rdo rje zhes brjod do //
translated: is called the “vajra of emptiness.”

original: de la sems dpa' ni dgongs pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la sems dpa' ni dgongs pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Here, the “hero” is the one who has the intention, and he is so called.

original: 'gro ba'i bla ma zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i slob dpon nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bla ma zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i slob dpon nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The “guru of the world” is so called because he is the master of the three worlds.

original: rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gsum pa de rnams ni sku gsung thugs ro mnyam par gyur cing phan tshun dbyer mi phyed pa'i ngo bo'i don gang la yod pa de nyid la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gsum pa de rnams ni sku gsung thugs ro mnyam par gyur cing phan tshun dbyer mi phyed pa'i ngo bo'i don gang la yod pa de nyid la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The “three vajras” are the three vajras of body, speech, and mind, and the one who has the meaning of the indivisible nature of those three vajras is so called.

original: de nyid gsum gyi go 'phang ston //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nyid gsum gyi go 'phang ston // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He teaches the state of the three realities.

original: de nyid gsum ni lus ngag yid gsum dag pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid gsum ni lus ngag yid gsum dag pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The three realities are the characteristics of the purities of body, speech, and mind.

original: go 'phang ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang ngo //
analyzed: go 'phang ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang ngo //
translated: The “state” is the state of Great Vajradhara.

original: de ston pa ni gdams ngag de ston pa po'o //
analyzed: de ston pa ni gdams ngag de ston pa po'o //
translated: “Teaching” is teaching that instruction.

original: rnal 'byor rgyud kyi zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor rgyud kyi zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The “yoga tantra”

original: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: is the Shri Guhyasamaja and so forth.

original: sbas pa'i don zhes bya ba ni mtha' drug gi don gyis gzung bar dka' ba'o //
analyzed: sbas pa'i don zhes bya ba ni mtha' drug gi don gyis gzung bar dka' ba'o //
translated: The hidden meaning is difficult to grasp due to the meaning of the six parameters.

original: bstan du gsol zhes bya ba ni bshad du gsol zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bstan du gsol zhes bya ba ni bshad du gsol zhes bya'o //
translated: Please teach means please explain.

original: 'gro ba'i bla ma zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i slob dpon zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bla ma zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i slob dpon zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The teacher of the world means the master of the three realms.

original: de ltar rnam pa gsum gyis gsol ba 'debs pa bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gsum gyis gsol ba 'debs pa bstan to //
translated: Thus, the request is made in three ways.

original: de tsam gyis rgyud spyi'i don bstan nas //
analyzed: de tsam gyis rgyud spyi'i don bstan nas //
translated: Having thus taught the general meaning of the tantra,

original: da ni rgyud kyi don brjod pa'i phyir de'i yan lag de la 'jug pa brjod pa ni /
analyzed: da ni rgyud kyi don brjod pa'i phyir de'i yan lag de la 'jug pa brjod pa ni /
translated: now, in order to express the meaning of the tantra, the branch that introduces to it is stated:

original: bstan pa mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: bstan pa mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Please teach means please explain.

original: phyag na rdo rjes sngon du gsungs pa'i rigs pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud bstan pa'i don du gsol ba gdab par byas nas /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rjes sngon du gsungs pa'i rigs pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud bstan pa'i don du gsol ba gdab par byas nas /
translated: Having made a request to the Blessed One, Great Vajradhara, for the teaching of the Vajra Garland Tantra with the reasoning stated by Vajrapāṇi earlier,

original: rdo rje yis ni khyab ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje yis ni khyab ces bya ba ni /
translated: pervading with vajra means

original: sems can thams cad kyi yul la snying rje chen pos gzhan dbang ngo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi yul la snying rje chen pos gzhan dbang ngo //
translated: the power of great compassion over the domain of all sentient beings.

original: slar yang rgyud la 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: slar yang rgyud la 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Again, entering into the tantra means

original: rgyud ni rdo rje phreng ba'i ming can la'o //
analyzed: rgyud ni rdo rje phreng ba'i ming can la'o //
translated: the tantra called the Vajra-garland.

original: 'jug pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan du'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan du'o //
translated: Because of entering, it is the reason for entering.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni gsol ba btab pa'i rjes su'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni gsol ba btab pa'i rjes su'o //
translated: Again, after the request means after the request.

original: dri ba gtan la dbab ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: dri ba gtan la dbab ces bya ba ni /
translated: The question is settled, it is said.

original: dri ba nges par bshad par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dri ba nges par bshad par 'gyur // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The question is explained, it is said.🔽 It will be explained, it is said.

original: bshad par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'chang par 'gyur pa'o //🔽de ltar de la 'jug @23a * //
analyzed: bshad par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'chang par 'gyur pa'o // de ltar de la 'jug @23a * //
translated: It will be held, it is said.

original: pa bstan nas /
analyzed: pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the entry into that,

original: da ni dri ba brjod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni dri ba brjod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach the statement of the question,

original: rdo rje phreng ba'i ming ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba'i ming ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says the name of the Vajra-garland, etc.

original: dang po nyid du brjod par bya ba'i yul la dri ba'o //
analyzed: dang po nyid du brjod par bya ba'i yul la dri ba'o //
translated: The question is about the object to be stated first.

original: 'dus pa ci zhig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dus pa ci zhig ces bya ba ni /
translated: What is the assembly?

original: rgyud gang gi bshad pa'i rgyud kyi ngo bo 'di de'i yul la ni gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud gang gi bshad pa'i rgyud kyi ngo bo 'di de'i yul la ni gnyis pa'o //
translated: The second question is about the nature of the explanatory tantra, the object of which is this tantra.

original: cung zhig stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni rgyud de la gang zhig gtso cher gang zhig stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo bstan pa de ji lta bu yin zhes bya ba ni gsum pa'o //🔽thig le'i dbye ba dang zhes bya ba ni de lta bur gyur pa'i stong pa nyid de la phyogs gcig gi rtogs par byed pa /
analyzed: cung zhig stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni rgyud de la gang zhig gtso cher gang zhig stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo bstan pa de ji lta bu yin zhes bya ba ni gsum pa'o // thig le'i dbye ba dang zhes bya ba ni de lta bur gyur pa'i stong pa nyid de la phyogs gcig gi rtogs par byed pa /
translated: The seventh is: What is the secret of the secret?🔽 The eighth is: What is the great secret?🔽 The ninth is: What is the supreme secret?🔽 The tenth is: What is the secret of secrets?🔽 The eleventh is: What is the secret of the great secret?🔽 The twelfth is: What is the secret of the supreme secret?🔽 The thirteenth is: What is the secret of the secret of secrets?

original: de ji lta bu yin zhes bya ba de'i rjes la bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de ji lta bu yin zhes bya ba de'i rjes la bzhi pa'o //
translated: The fourteenth is: What is the secret of the great secret of the supreme secret?

original: sgra zhes bya ba ni thig le'u dbye bas thabs gang gis 'gyur ba de'i don du sgra'i yul la dri ba lnga ba'o //🔽de yang aa yig gi ngo bo brjod par 'gyur ba'o //🔽gsang ba dang ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sgra zhes bya ba ni thig le'u dbye bas thabs gang gis 'gyur ba de'i don du sgra'i yul la dri ba lnga ba'o // de yang aa yig gi ngo bo brjod par 'gyur ba'o // gsang ba dang ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The fifteenth is: What is the secret of the secret of the great secret of the supreme secret?🔽 The sixteenth is: What is the secret of the secret of the secret of the great secret of the supreme secret?

original: sgra mngon par gsal bar byed pa'i ngo bo drug pa'o ;
analyzed: sgra mngon par gsal bar byed pa'i ngo bo drug pa'o ;
translated: The seventeenth is: What is the secret of the secret of the secret of the great secret of the supreme secret of the secret?🔽 The eighteenth is: What is the secret of the secret of the secret of the great secret of the supreme secret of the secret of secrets?

original: / gsang ba gang zhes brjod pa zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: / gsang ba gang zhes brjod pa zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The nineteenth is: What is the secret of the secret of the secret of the great secret of the supreme secret of the secret of the secret of secrets?🔽 The twentieth is: What is the secret of the secret of the secret of the great secret of the supreme secret of the secret of the secret of the secret of secrets?🔽 The twenty-first is: What is the secret of the secret of the secret of the great secret of the supreme secret of the secret of the secret of the secret of the secret of secrets?🔽 The twenty-second is: What is the secret of the secret of the secret of the great secret of the supreme secret of the secret of the secret of the secret of the secret of the secret of secrets?🔽 The twenty-third is: What is the secret of the secret of the secret of the great secret of the

original: dam tshig sdom pa zhes bya ba ni sngon du gsungs pa'i gsang ba mngon par gsal ba ni dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas pa nyid la bya'i gzhan la ni ma yin zhes bya ba de'i don du dam tshig dang sdom pa'i yul ni dri ba bdun
analyzed: dam tshig sdom pa zhes bya ba ni sngon du gsungs pa'i gsang ba mngon par gsal ba ni dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas pa nyid la bya'i gzhan la ni ma yin zhes bya ba de'i don du dam tshig dang sdom pa'i yul ni dri ba bdun
translated: The so-called commitments and vows is the elucidation of the secret previously mentioned, which is to say that it is only for those who abide in the commitments and vows, not for others. The meaning of that is the seventh question, the domain of the commitments and vows.

original: pa'o ; / de la dam tshig gnas gcig tu ts'a ru'i bza' ba la sogs pa dang / rigs lnga'i dam tshig gi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: pa'o ; / de la dam tshig gnas gcig tu ts'a ru'i bza' ba la sogs pa dang / rigs lnga'i dam tshig gi rnam pa'o //
translated: Therein, the commitments are the nature of the commitments of the five families, such as the consumption of the caru oblation in one place, and so on.

original: sdom pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi dam tshig gis bsrung bar bya ba'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: sdom pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi dam tshig gis bsrung bar bya ba'i ngo bo ste /
translated: The so-called vows is the essence of what is to be protected by one's commitments.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
translated: As will be explained:

original: de nas gzhan yang sdom pa'i don //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang sdom pa'i don //
translated: Next, the meaning of the vows

original: de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon //
analyzed: de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon //
translated: is taught, so listen to reality.

original: sdom pa srung bar byed pa gang //
analyzed: sdom pa srung bar byed pa gang //
translated: Whoever protects the vows

original: de ni byang chub sems zhes brjod //🔽ces gsungs te /
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems zhes brjod // ces gsungs te /
translated: is said to be a bodhisattva.

original: dam tshig ces bya ba ni bza' bar bya ba'i ngo bo ston par byed pa'i dri ba brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ces bya ba ni bza' bar bya ba'i ngo bo ston par byed pa'i dri ba brgyad pa'o //
translated: The so-called commitments is the eighth question, which teaches the nature of what is to be consumed.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
translated: As will be explained:

original: bza' ba ru ni bshad pa gang //
analyzed: bza' ba ru ni bshad pa gang //
translated: What was explained as food

original: da ni bdud rtsi lngar ni brjod //
analyzed: da ni bdud rtsi lngar ni brjod //
translated: is now called the five nectars.

original: ces gsungs te /
analyzed: ces gsungs te /
translated: As it is said.

original: sgra tsam dang zhes bya ba ni dri ba lnga ba'i rgyas par bshad pa dang 'dra ba ni dgu pa'o //
analyzed: sgra tsam dang zhes bya ba ni dri ba lnga ba'i rgyas par bshad pa dang 'dra ba ni dgu pa'o //
translated: The mere sound is like the extensive explanation of the fifth question, and the ninth is like the extensive explanation of the tenth question.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba'i /🔽chos kyi 'khor lo pang sbubs nas //
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba'i / chos kyi 'khor lo pang sbubs nas //
translated: As will be explained:🔽The mere sound of the Dharma wheel

original: sgra tsam yang dag gnas pa ni //
analyzed: sgra tsam yang dag gnas pa ni //
translated: residing in the secret lotus

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: is called the mere sound.

original: rlung gi de nyid ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: rlung gi de nyid ces bya ba ni /
translated: The reality of the wind is

analyzed: bzhi pa'i dri ba'i rgyas @23b par bshad pa bcu ba'i dri ba'o //

original: ji ltar 'chad par 'gyur ba ni //
analyzed: ji ltar 'chad par 'gyur ba ni //

analyzed: rlung gi theg le ye shes che //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: bde chen ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phreng ba'i dri ba'i rgyas bar bshad par gyur pa dri ba bcu gcig pa'o //

original: ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba yi //
analyzed: ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba yi //

analyzed: rdor sems go 'phang mi phyed pa //

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: mi phyed rdo rje zhes ni brjod //

analyzed: de yi rten ni snying padma //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //

analyzed: sngags kyi de nyid ces bya ba ni /

analyzed: ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba yi //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //

analyzed: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa'i sgom pa po rnams kyi'o //
translated: are those who meditate on vajra repetition.🔽The winds are

translated: the characteristics of the winds🔽are explained in brief

analyzed: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya //

analyzed: zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba yi //

analyzed: 'khor lo drug la bcu drug brten //

analyzed: ji ltar gnas la rigs par sbyor //

analyzed: rnal 'byor lus la rtsa gang lags //
