original: gsang ba'i 'bras bu mchog nyid nyon //
analyzed: gsang ba'i 'bras bu mchog nyid nyon //
translated: Listen!

original: gang gis dngos grub mchog tu 'gro //
analyzed: gang gis dngos grub mchog tu 'gro //
translated: By which one goes to the supreme attainment,

original: phyag rgya chen po yang dag bsten //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po yang dag bsten //
translated: the great seal is perfectly relied upon.

original: gsang ba'i spas pa zhes ni bshad //
analyzed: gsang ba'i spas pa zhes ni bshad //
translated: It is explained as the secret seal.

original: rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes shing //
analyzed: rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes shing //
translated: The child yogi does not know it,

original: bzhi pa'i dbang zhes bya ba'i ming //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i dbang zhes bya ba'i ming //
translated: and it has the name of the fourth empowerment.

original: zhal nas zhal du brgyud rim gnas //
analyzed: zhal nas zhal du brgyud rim gnas //
translated: It abides in the lineage from mouth to mouth.

original: mchog tu zhi ba'i ye shes che //
analyzed: mchog tu zhi ba'i ye shes che //
translated: The supreme, great wisdom of peace,

original: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
analyzed: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
translated: free from all conceptual thoughts.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: And so forth.

original: chos kyi dbyings dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The dharmadhatu is

original: ji lta bu zhes bya ba'i lhag ma'o //
analyzed: ji lta bu zhes bya ba'i lhag ma'o //
translated: incomplete with what is it like?.

original: gsang ba'i 'bras bu ni ming gi rnam grangs la de'i yul la dri ba sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i 'bras bu ni ming gi rnam grangs la de'i yul la dri ba sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o //
translated: The secret fruit is the thirty-ninth question about its object in the synonyms.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur pa las //
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur pa las //
translated: As will be explained.

original: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
translated: Then the Bhagavān Vajra said:

original: chos kyi dbyings ni go 'phang mchog / chos kun dbus na khyab pa'i mchog / chos kyi dbyings zhes de la brjod //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ni go 'phang mchog / chos kun dbus na khyab pa'i mchog / chos kyi dbyings zhes de la brjod //
translated: it is called the realm of phenomena.🔽All-pervading, supremely subtle,

original: kun khyab mchog tu phra pa dang // thams cad du ni kun nas 'char //
analyzed: kun khyab mchog tu phra pa dang // thams cad du ni kun nas 'char //
translated: arising everywhere,

original: zhes bya pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: and so forth.

original: de yang gtso bo dang gtso bo ma yin pa'i dbye ba rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de yang gtso bo dang gtso bo ma yin pa'i dbye ba rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Moreover, it has a twofold division into primary and secondary.

original: de'i yul la dri ba ni bzhi bcu pa'o //
analyzed: de'i yul la dri ba ni bzhi bcu pa'o //
translated: The question about its object is the fortieth.

original: rdo rje yang zhes bya ba ni de'i gnas skabs nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje yang zhes bya ba ni de'i gnas skabs nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The word also in vajra also is because of its very state.

original: de yang gtso bo dang gtso bo ma yin pa'i dbye bas sngon bzhin no //
analyzed: de yang gtso bo dang gtso bo ma yin pa'i dbye bas sngon bzhin no //
translated: And that, like before, is divided into primary and secondary.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
translated: As will be explained:

original: de nas bcom ldan rdo rje gsungs //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan rdo rje gsungs //
translated: Then the Blessed One spoke the vajra,🔽the supreme characteristic of the vajra,

original: rdo rje yi ni mtshan nyid mchog / de nas rnam par phye ba nyon //
analyzed: rdo rje yi ni mtshan nyid mchog / de nas rnam par phye ba nyon //
translated: then listen to the division.

original: ji lta ba bzhin bshad par bya //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin bshad par bya //
translated: I will explain just as it is.

original: rdo rje mi phyed ces ni gsungs //
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed ces ni gsungs //
translated: The vajra is said to be indivisible,

original: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The supreme nature of the five pristine awarenesses.

original: gzhung 'di tsam gyis rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rjes nas bshad pa'i yul la dri ba'i tshogs gsungs so //
analyzed: gzhung 'di tsam gyis rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rjes nas bshad pa'i yul la dri ba'i tshogs gsungs so //
translated: With just this text, the set of questions regarding the domain of the explanation of the Yoginī Tantras is stated.

original: da ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud gcig pu'i bshad pa'i @27b dbye ba dri ba'i rim pa la 'jug pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud gcig pu'i bshad pa'i @27b dbye ba dri ba'i rim pa la 'jug pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to enter the sequence of questions regarding the divisions of the explanation of the sole Great Yoga Tantra,

original: rigs kyi dbye ba ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: rigs kyi dbye ba ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: it is asked, “What is the division of the families?”

original: rigs ni rgyun no //
analyzed: rigs ni rgyun no //
translated: A family is a continuum.

original: de rnam pa du zhes grangs kyi yul la dri pa ni bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o //
analyzed: de rnam pa du zhes grangs kyi yul la dri pa ni bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o //
translated: The question regarding the number of those is the forty-first.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained,

original: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
translated: then the Bhagavān Vajra spoke:

original: rigs kyi dbye ba'i don bsdus pa //
analyzed: rigs kyi dbye ba'i don bsdus pa //
translated: The summary of the meaning of the division of the families,

original: de tshe rigs ni rnam pa lnga //
analyzed: de tshe rigs ni rnam pa lnga //
translated: at that time the families are of five types,

original: rtsa ba'i rgyud ni gsal bar gsungs //🔽spro ba'i sbyor ba'i dbye ba yis //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rgyud ni gsal bar gsungs // spro ba'i sbyor ba'i dbye ba yis //
translated: clearly stated in the Root Tantra.🔽The pledge of the Great Yoga

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig go //
translated: is by the division of the yoga of emanation.

original: rgyud du grangs kyi dbye pa ni //
analyzed: rgyud du grangs kyi dbye pa ni //
translated: The division of the number in the tantra

original: gang dag de nyid gsal bar gsungs //
analyzed: gang dag de nyid gsal bar gsungs //
translated: And the clear teaching of reality.

original: zhes bya pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: phyag rgya'i dbye ba ji tsam zhig / ces bya pa ni /
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dbye ba ji tsam zhig / ces bya pa ni /
translated: How many kinds of seals are there?

original: thabs kyis rab tu dbye pa ni bstan zin to //
analyzed: thabs kyis rab tu dbye pa ni bstan zin to //
translated: The division by means of method has already been taught.

original: rigs dpag tu med pa'i dbye ba dang / rigs brgya'i dbye ba dang / rigs lnga'i dbye ba ji tsam zhig ces de'i yul la dri ba gtso bo dang / gtso bo ma yin pa'i dbye bas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: rigs dpag tu med pa'i dbye ba dang / rigs brgya'i dbye ba dang / rigs lnga'i dbye ba ji tsam zhig ces de'i yul la dri ba gtso bo dang / gtso bo ma yin pa'i dbye bas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
translated: The principal question is about the domain of the seals, namely, how many kinds of infinite families, how many kinds of hundred families, and how many kinds of five families there are. The secondary question is about the division into principal and secondary, making forty-two in all.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las //🔽de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
translated: As will be explained,🔽then the Blessed One, Vajra,

original: phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na med //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na med //
translated: taught the unsurpassed division of the seals.

original: las dang chos dang dam tshig dang // phyag rgya chen po zhes su grags //
analyzed: las dang chos dang dam tshig dang // phyag rgya chen po zhes su grags //
translated: The action, doctrine, commitment, and great seals are renowned.

original: las rnams nges pa'i rnam smin gyis //
analyzed: las rnams nges pa'i rnam smin gyis //
translated: The actions are the ripening of the definite,

original: 'bras bu rgyas btab lta bur gnas //
analyzed: 'bras bu rgyas btab lta bur gnas //
translated: like a seal upon the fruit.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //🔽phung po la sogs skye mched ci //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so // phung po la sogs skye mched ci //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: What are the aggregates and so forth, and what are the sense fields?

original: phud po dang khams dang skye mched rnams ji lta bu zhes sngar bstan pa'i rigs kyi dbye ba'i lhag mar gyur pa'i dri ba bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o //
analyzed: phud po dang khams dang skye mched rnams ji lta bu zhes sngar bstan pa'i rigs kyi dbye ba'i lhag mar gyur pa'i dri ba bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o //
translated: The remaining questions are the forty-three.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained:

original: de nas gzhan yang yang dag bshad //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang yang dag bshad //
translated: Now, moreover, I will explain

original: phung sogs skye mched mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: phung sogs skye mched mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The characteristics of the aggregates and so forth.

original: dzi na dzi ka ni gzugs zhes bshad //
analyzed: dzi na dzi ka ni gzugs zhes bshad //
translated: Jinavajra is explained as form.

original: badzra dhri ka ni rnan shes dang // ratna dhri ka ni tshor bar gsungs //
analyzed: badzra dhri ka ni rnan shes dang // ratna dhri ka ni tshor bar gsungs //
translated: Vajradhṛk is consciousness, and Ratnadhrk is said to be feeling.

original: a'a ro li ka ni 'du shes grags //
analyzed: a'a ro li ka ni 'du shes grags //
translated: Ārolik is known as perception.

original: pra dzny'a dhri ka ni 'du byed dang // de ltar phung por rab tu grags //
analyzed: pra dzny'a dhri ka ni 'du byed dang // de ltar phung por rab tu grags //
translated: Prajñādhṛk is formation, and thus they are known as the aggregates.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i ming ni ci zhig bya ba ni /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i ming ni ci zhig bya ba ni /
translated: What is the name of the great seal?

original: phyag rgya'i dbye ba ji tsam zhig //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dbye ba ji tsam zhig //
translated: How many types of seals are there?

original: ces dri ba phyogs gcig pa la bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'i lhag mar gyur pa phyag rgya chen po'i yul la dri pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: ces dri ba phyogs gcig pa la bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'i lhag mar gyur pa phyag rgya chen po'i yul la dri pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
translated: This is a single question with forty-two remaining questions, the forty-fourth question regarding the domain of the great seal.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur pa las //
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur pa las //
translated: As will be explained.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya pa //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya pa //
translated: Next, I will explain

original: phyag rgya chen po'i don mtshan nyid //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i don mtshan nyid //
translated: the meaning of the great seal, the characteristic,

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i 'bras bu ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i 'bras bu ni //
translated: the result of the great yoga,

original: ye shes chen po'i don bsdus pa //
analyzed: ye shes chen po'i don bsdus pa //
translated: the summary of the meaning of great intuition.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: As it is said.

original: ro rnams kyi ni dbye ba dang // zhes bya @28a * //
analyzed: ro rnams kyi ni dbye ba dang // zhes bya @28a * //
translated: The divisions of the tastes,

original: pa ni ; phyag rgya chen po la 'jug pa'i dus su /🔽'dar dang rdul dang ba spu langs //🔽dbyangs kyi dbye ba sprug pa dang // lugs bsgyur mchi ma thim pa dang // snying stobs nyams ni brgyad po rnams //
analyzed: pa ni ; phyag rgya chen po la 'jug pa'i dus su / 'dar dang rdul dang ba spu langs // dbyangs kyi dbye ba sprug pa dang // lugs bsgyur mchi ma thim pa dang // snying stobs nyams ni brgyad po rnams //
translated: at the time of entering into the great seal,🔽are trembling, perspiration, and horripilation,🔽the divisions of the voice, shaking, reversal, tears, and melting,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: and the eight kinds of loss of courage.

original: de lta pur gyur pa'i sgeg pa'i nyams kyi dbye ba rnams ji lta bu zhes de'i yul la dri ba bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o //
analyzed: de lta pur gyur pa'i sgeg pa'i nyams kyi dbye ba rnams ji lta bu zhes de'i yul la dri ba bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o //
translated: Thus, the divisions of the experience of passion are of what kind?

original: ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
analyzed: ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
translated: As will be explained.

original: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
translated: Then the Lord Vajra

original: nyams kyi mtshan nyid dbye ba ni //
analyzed: nyams kyi mtshan nyid dbye ba ni //
translated: taught the divisions of the characteristics of experience,

original: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: beginning with

original: ji srid / dga' ba rgyags pa rtsa yi cha //
analyzed: ji srid / dga' ba rgyags pa rtsa yi cha //
translated: the part of the channel of joy and intoxication

original: khong stong 'dar ba skye par byed //
analyzed: khong stong 'dar ba skye par byed //
translated: causes trembling and emptiness in the stomach.

original: ces bya ba'i bar gyis so //🔽bdag gi sgra ni gang na gnas //
analyzed: ces bya ba'i bar gyis so // bdag gi sgra ni gang na gnas //
translated: Up to here.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Where is the sound of the self located?

original: sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid kyi yul la dri ba bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'i lhag mar gyur pa aa ham gi ngo bo de'i rnam par dag pa sgra gang na gnas zhes de'i yul la dri ba bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid kyi yul la dri ba bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'i lhag mar gyur pa aa ham gi ngo bo de'i rnam par dag pa sgra gang na gnas zhes de'i yul la dri ba bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o //
translated: This is the forty-sixth question about the object of the previously explained mahāmudrā-defined consort, the remainder of the forty-four questions, “Where is the sound of the essence of aham located?”

original: ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
analyzed: ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
translated: As will be explained:

original: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
translated: Then the Bhagavān Vajra said:

original: bdag ces bya ba sgra yi rten //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba sgra yi rten //
translated: The sound of the self is the basis,

original: gang gis yang dag shes pa yis //
analyzed: gang gis yang dag shes pa yis //
translated: by which one who knows

original: 'khor ba'i 'ching bar mtshan nyid do //🔽aa ham 'khor par 'ching ba yi //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i 'ching bar mtshan nyid do // aa ham 'khor par 'ching ba yi //
translated: the characteristics of the bondage of saṃsāra

original: de ni yongs zad grol ba yin //
analyzed: de ni yongs zad grol ba yin //
translated: is completely liberated from the bondage of saṃsāra.🔽A is the supreme of all things,

original: aa ni dngos po kun gyi mchog / lus rnams kun la lhag par gnas //
analyzed: aa ni dngos po kun gyi mchog / lus rnams kun la lhag par gnas //
translated: abiding in all bodies.

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / ham yig dngos po dang bral ba //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / ham yig dngos po dang bral ba //
translated: The letter haṃ is free from entities,

original: lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o //
translated: Abiding in the body, not born from the body.

original: dbang po las 'das mi gsal pa //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das mi gsal pa //
translated: Beyond the senses, not clear,

original: rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
translated: Abandoning all aspects.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: And so on.

original: stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa dang // zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa dang // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The divisions of emptiness are summarized.

original: bshad ma thag pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i dri ba bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'i lhag mar gyur pa /
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i dri ba bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'i lhag mar gyur pa /
translated: The remaining forty-four questions about the just-explained mahāmudrā

original: stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa dri ba'i yul bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o //
analyzed: stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa dri ba'i yul bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o //
translated: are the forty-seven questions that summarize the divisions of emptiness.

original: ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
analyzed: ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
translated: As will be explained,

original: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
translated: then the Bhagavān Vajra spoke:

original: stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa ni //
analyzed: stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa ni //
translated: The divisions of emptiness are summarized.

original: rnal 'byor pa ni gang gis shes //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa ni gang gis shes //
translated: By what means does the yogi know🔽that emptiness?

original: stong nyid de ni shes par 'gyur //
analyzed: stong nyid de ni shes par 'gyur //
translated: Emptiness is known

original: mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyir //
analyzed: mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyir //
translated: because of the discordant and the antidote.

original: stong nyid bsgom par yongs su gsungs //
analyzed: stong nyid bsgom par yongs su gsungs //
translated: Meditation on emptiness is fully taught.

original: nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams ni //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams ni //
translated: The phenomena of the inner nature

original: kun du rtog pa'i gnyen po dang // phyin ci log gi rnam dag pa //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid du bshad //
analyzed: kun du rtog pa'i gnyen po dang // phyin ci log gi rnam dag pa // phyi nang stong pa nyid du bshad //
translated: The antidote to conceptualization, the purification of error,

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: is explained as the emptiness of the external and the internal.🔽The forty-eighth question is:

original: stong pa nyid ni gang du skye //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: stong pa nyid ni gang du skye // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Where does emptiness arise?

original: bshad ma thag pa'i @28b dri ba'i lhag mar gyur pa dri ba 'di ni bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i @28b dri ba'i lhag mar gyur pa dri ba 'di ni bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
translated: This is a continuation of the question just explained.

original: de yang bskyed pa'i rim pas zhal dang phyag dang dbyibs bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: de yang bskyed pa'i rim pas zhal dang phyag dang dbyibs bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: Moreover, it is the nature of the meditation on the face, hands, and form of the creation stage.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained:

original: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
translated: Then the Blessed One, Vajra,

original: stong pa nyid ni skye ba'i rgyu //
analyzed: stong pa nyid ni skye ba'i rgyu //
translated: said that emptiness is the cause of arising.

original: zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas //
translated: Starting from there,

original: rdo rje phreng ba de ltar bshad //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba de ltar bshad //
translated: the Vajra Garland explains

original: srog gi rten gyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: srog gi rten gyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: the characteristics of the support of life.

original: sku mdog sngon po zhal gsum pa //
analyzed: sku mdog sngon po zhal gsum pa //
translated: Blue-colored, three-faced,

original: spyan gsum pa la phyag rgya mchog / ces bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //🔽nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo gang //
analyzed: spyan gsum pa la phyag rgya mchog / ces bya ba'i bar du gsungs so // nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo gang //
translated: three-eyed, with the supreme mudra.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: What is day and what is night?

original: de lta bu'i rnam pas rdo rje phreng ba bsgom pa la thun mtshams bzhi la 'os pa nyid kyi phyir de'i don du nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i yul la dri ba bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam pas rdo rje phreng ba bsgom pa la thun mtshams bzhi la 'os pa nyid kyi phyir de'i don du nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i yul la dri ba bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o //
translated: In this way, the Vajra Rosary is to be meditated upon, and for the sake of that, there are forty-nine questions about the objects of day and night, in order to be suitable for the four periods of the day.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained:

original: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
translated: Then the Blessed One, Vajra, said:

original: mtshan mo nyin mo'i mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: mtshan mo nyin mo'i mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The characteristics of night and day,

original: mtshan mo shes rab shes par bya //
analyzed: mtshan mo shes rab shes par bya //
translated: Night is to be known as wisdom,

original: 'byung ba thams cad thim nas 'gro //
analyzed: 'byung ba thams cad thim nas 'gro //
translated: All the elements dissolve and go.

original: zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas /
translated: Starting from here,🔽As long as

original: ji srid ; nyin mo slar yang thabs su bshad //
analyzed: ji srid ; nyin mo slar yang thabs su bshad //
translated: Day is again explained as method.🔽Method becomes day,

original: thabs ni nyin mor gyur pa dang // zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
analyzed: thabs ni nyin mor gyur pa dang // zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
translated: and so on.

original: a'a li k'a li'i brda dang ni //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li'i brda dang ni //
translated: The signs of Alikali

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means:

original: sngon du gsungs pa'i stong pa nyid //
analyzed: sngon du gsungs pa'i stong pa nyid //
translated: The emptiness previously taught,🔽Where will it arise?

original: gang du skye ba 'gyur zhes de lta bu'i rnam pas dri ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i lhag mar gyur ba /
analyzed: gang du skye ba 'gyur zhes de lta bu'i rnam pas dri ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i lhag mar gyur ba /
translated: In this way, the remaining forty-eight questions are asked.

original: a'a li k'a li'i brda ni gang //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li'i brda ni gang //
translated: What is the meaning of the syllables ālikāli?

original: zhes de'i yul la dri ba lnga bcu pa'o //
analyzed: zhes de'i yul la dri ba lnga bcu pa'o //
translated: This is the fiftieth question.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained:

original: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
translated: Then the Blessed One, Vajra,

original: a'a li k'a li'i dam tshig ni //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li'i dam tshig ni //
translated: said the commitment of ālikāli,

original: rgyud rnams kun du'ang gsungs pa yi //
analyzed: rgyud rnams kun du'ang gsungs pa yi //
translated: which is taught in all the tantras,

original: rgyal sras rnams la dgongs pa ni //🔽'od gsal go 'phang las skyes pa //
analyzed: rgyal sras rnams la dgongs pa ni // 'od gsal go 'phang las skyes pa //
translated: is the intention for the bodhisattvas.🔽The stage of luminous clarity

original: snang ba mched pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: snang ba mched pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
translated: is the defining characteristic of the stage of the increase of appearance,

original: gsal byed sum cu rtsa gsum ldan //
analyzed: gsal byed sum cu rtsa gsum ldan //
translated: endowed with thirty-three illuminators.🔽The stage of the increase of appearance

original: a'a li'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa yi //🔽snang ba mched pa'i go 'phang ni //
analyzed: a'a li'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa yi // snang ba mched pa'i go 'phang ni //
translated: is the stage of the increase of the ālikāli maṇḍala.

original: snang ba las byung zad pa med //🔽dbyangs ni drug cu dang ldan pa //
analyzed: snang ba las byung zad pa med // dbyangs ni drug cu dang ldan pa //
translated: The appearance that arises from appearance is inexhaustible.🔽The stage of the increase of the ālikāli maṇḍala

original: a'a li'i 'khor lo rgyas pa yi //
analyzed: a'a li'i 'khor lo rgyas pa yi //
translated: is endowed with sixty vowels.

original: zhes gsungs so ;
analyzed: zhes gsungs so ;
translated: This is taught.

original: / mtshams kyi 'char ba ji lta bu //🔽zhes bya ba ni /🔽mtshams ni / snang ba nye bar thob pa yis //
analyzed: / mtshams kyi 'char ba ji lta bu // zhes bya ba ni / mtshams ni / snang ba nye bar thob pa yis //
translated: What is the arising of the intermediate state?🔽The intermediate state is the arising of the essence

original: ngo bor shar ba ji lta bu //
analyzed: ngo bor shar ba ji lta bu //
translated: through the attainment of appearance.

original: zhes de'i yul la dri ba lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o //
analyzed: zhes de'i yul la dri ba lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o //
translated: Thus, there are fifty-one questions about its object.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained:

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon //
translated: “Now listen, I will explain

original: mtshams kyi mtshan nyid bla na med //🔽snang dang @29a * //
analyzed: mtshams kyi mtshan nyid bla na med // snang dang @29a * //
translated: the unsurpassed characteristics of the boundary,

original: mi snang bral ba'i mtshams //
analyzed: mi snang bral ba'i mtshams //
translated: the boundary free from appearance and non-appearance,

original: ye shes rdo rje las byung ba //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje las byung ba //
translated: arisen from the vajra of wisdom,

original: gnyis 'dres pa yi dbus na gnas //
analyzed: gnyis 'dres pa yi dbus na gnas //
translated: abiding in the middle of the union of the two,

original: 'phags shing gos pa rnam par spangs //
analyzed: 'phags shing gos pa rnam par spangs //
translated: noble and free from defilement,

original: rdo rje padma 'chi med skyes //
analyzed: rdo rje padma 'chi med skyes //
translated: the vajra lotus born from immortality,

original: zla ba nyi ma yang dag 'dres //
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma yang dag 'dres //
translated: the perfect union of moon and sun,

original: mtha' ni yang dag mi 'gro gang //
analyzed: mtha' ni yang dag mi 'gro gang //
translated: the boundary that does not go to an end,

original: mtshams de srid pa dag par byed ;
analyzed: mtshams de srid pa dag par byed ;
translated: that boundary purifies existence.”

original: / ces bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud gcig pu gtsor byas pa'i don gyi dbye ba bshad pa dri ba'i tshogs gsungs /
analyzed: / ces bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud gcig pu gtsor byas pa'i don gyi dbye ba bshad pa dri ba'i tshogs gsungs /
translated: Thus, the text explains the divisions of the meaning of the sole principal Mahāyoga Tantra, and the collection of questions is stated.

original: da ni gtso po ma yin par gyur pa'i dri ba'i tshogs brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni gtso po ma yin par gyur pa'i dri ba'i tshogs brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the collection of questions that are not principal will be stated.

original: sngon du bsnyen sogs slob dpon dang // cho ga nyi shu las dang ni //
analyzed: sngon du bsnyen sogs slob dpon dang // cho ga nyi shu las dang ni //
translated: The master, the preliminary, etc. , the twenty rites, and the activity.

original: zhes bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo ji lta bu zhes bya ba'i lhag ma'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo ji lta bu zhes bya ba'i lhag ma'o //
translated: What is their nature? This is the remainder.

original: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ston par byed pa'i cho ga nyi shu las bcas pa'i phrin las kyi yul la dri ba lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ston par byed pa'i cho ga nyi shu las bcas pa'i phrin las kyi yul la dri ba lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
translated: This is the fifty-second chapter on the questions regarding the field of activity of the rite of the twenty-one rites that reveal the colored-powder mandala of glorious Guhyasamaja.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
translated: As will be explained:

original: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
translated: Then the Bhagavat Vajra

original: rnam pa nyi shu'i ming can no ;
analyzed: rnam pa nyi shu'i ming can no ;
translated: Expounded the twenty-fold name.

original: / slob dpon las su yongs su bshad //
analyzed: / slob dpon las su yongs su bshad //
translated: The master is fully explained.

original: sngags kyi rnal 'byor legs rgyas pa //
analyzed: sngags kyi rnal 'byor legs rgyas pa //
translated: The yoga of mantra is well-expanded.

original: sngon du bsnyen pas sbyang ba dang // de nas 'byung po bskrad pa dang // sa bzung nyid dang sbyangs pa dang // thig skud lhag par gnas pa dang // bgegs bskrad shin tu gsal pa dang // de bzhin dkyil 'khor thig gdab dang // phur bu gdab dang brdung ba dang //
analyzed: sngon du bsnyen pas sbyang ba dang // de nas 'byung po bskrad pa dang // sa bzung nyid dang sbyangs pa dang // thig skud lhag par gnas pa dang // bgegs bskrad shin tu gsal pa dang // de bzhin dkyil 'khor thig gdab dang // phur bu gdab dang brdung ba dang //
translated: the planting of the kīlas, and the striking,🔽the consecration of the vase,🔽the consecration of the Bhagavān,🔽the bathing, the purification,🔽the consecration of the offerings, the bali,🔽the consecration of the disciples,

original: bum pa byin gyis brlab pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyi lhag gnas dang // khrus dang rab tu sbyangs pa dang // mchod pa rab gnas gtor ma dang // slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang // me la sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin //
analyzed: bum pa byin gyis brlab pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyi lhag gnas dang // khrus dang rab tu sbyangs pa dang // mchod pa rab gnas gtor ma dang // slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang // me la sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin //
translated: and the fire puja according to the rite,

original: dbang bskur ba dang gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba dang gshegs su gsol //
translated: the conferral of empowerment, and the request for departure.

original: de ltar cho ga nyi shu las //
analyzed: de ltar cho ga nyi shu las //
translated: Thus, from the twenty rites,

original: gang gis de shes 'gro ba'i bla //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gang gis de shes 'gro ba'i bla // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: he who knows that is the lord of the world.

original: rgyu mtshan ci zhig 'bras bu'ang ci //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan ci zhig 'bras bu'ang ci //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
translated: What is the reason? What is the result?

original: cho ga nyi shu las bshad pa la rgyu mtshan ni gang dang 'bras bu ni gang zhes de'i yul la dri ba lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga nyi shu las bshad pa la rgyu mtshan ni gang dang 'bras bu ni gang zhes de'i yul la dri ba lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o //
translated: The twenty rituals explain the reasons and the results.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained,

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon //
translated: “Now listen as I explain the others.

original: de yi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu ni //
analyzed: de yi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu ni //
translated: The reasons and the results

original: las ni cho ga nyi shu bshad //
analyzed: las ni cho ga nyi shu bshad //
translated: are explained in the twenty rituals.

original: dbang phyug chen po'i rgyu mtshan ci //
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po'i rgyu mtshan ci //
translated: What is the reason for Maheśvara?

original: de yi 'bras bu ci zhig 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi 'bras bu ci zhig 'gyur //
translated: What will be the result of that?

original: 'di ni chen po'i chen pos gsungs //
analyzed: 'di ni chen po'i chen pos gsungs //
translated: This is taught by the Great of the Great.

original: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
translated: Then the Blessed Vajra taught:🔽The reasons and results of the ritual,

original: las kyi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu @29b dang ; / sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs pa //
analyzed: las kyi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu @29b dang ; / sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs pa //
translated: the preliminary service, and so forth,

original: rgyu mtshan 'jig rten dngos grub brgyad //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan 'jig rten dngos grub brgyad //
translated: the reasons for the eight mundane siddhis,

original: ser sna la sogs bsal ba'i phyir //
analyzed: ser sna la sogs bsal ba'i phyir //
translated: in order to eliminate miserliness and so forth,

original: sangs rgyas mchod pa rnam bsgom nyid //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mchod pa rnam bsgom nyid //
translated: the meditation on the worship of the buddhas,🔽and so forth.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin du /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin du /
translated: And likewise:🔽The subtle seed of the maṇḍala

original: dkyil 'khor sa bon phra rab dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor sa bon phra rab dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam //
translated: is the equality of all tathāgatas.

original: mchod pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang // de ltar 'bras bu 'khor lo 'jug / sangs rgyas thams cad rtag mchod na //
analyzed: mchod pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang // de ltar 'bras bu 'khor lo 'jug / sangs rgyas thams cad rtag mchod na //
translated: If one always worships all the Buddhas,

original: las kyi sgrib pa dag par 'gyur //
analyzed: las kyi sgrib pa dag par 'gyur //
translated: karmic obscurations will be purified.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: mchod pa'i cho ga ji ltar gsungs //
analyzed: mchod pa'i cho ga ji ltar gsungs //
translated: How is the procedure of worship taught?

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i lhag ma'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i lhag ma'o //
translated: the remainder of the chapter on the meditative stabilization of the completion stage.

original: cho ga nyi shu po 'di nyid kyi las kyi lhag mar gyur pa'i dri ba lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga nyi shu po 'di nyid kyi las kyi lhag mar gyur pa'i dri ba lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
translated: This is the fifty-fourth supplementary question, which is the remainder of the twenty procedures.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
translated: As will be explained:

original: de nas rdo rje sems dpas gsungs //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje sems dpas gsungs //
translated: Then Vajrasattva said:

original: mchod pa'i chog bla na med //
analyzed: mchod pa'i chog bla na med //
translated: The unsurpassed procedure of worship,

original: gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: by the yoga of nondual equality,

original: lus la mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim //
analyzed: lus la mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim //
translated: the procedure of worship in the body,🔽the stages of the body,

original: rdo shing sa dang gser gyi ni //
analyzed: rdo shing sa dang gser gyi ni //
translated: the images of stone, wood, and gold,🔽one should not prostrate to them.

original: sku gzugs la ni phyag mi bya //
analyzed: sku gzugs la ni phyag mi bya //
translated: One should never perform consecration,🔽maṇḍala, or fire puja,

original: rab gnas dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang // de ni nam yang mi bya ste //
analyzed: rab gnas dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang // de ni nam yang mi bya ste //
translated: nor should one ever prostrate

original: rin chen rdo chu dkon mchog sogs //
analyzed: rin chen rdo chu dkon mchog sogs //
translated: to jewels, stones, water, the Three Jewels,

original: bdag nyid lnga ni rtag tu mchod //
analyzed: bdag nyid lnga ni rtag tu mchod //
translated: The five selves are always worshipped.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa dang // de bzhin du /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa dang // de bzhin du /
translated: And similarly,

original: de ltar de dag rnam shes bya //
analyzed: de ltar de dag rnam shes bya //
translated: Thus they are known as consciousnesses.

original: rtsa rnams la yang mchod par bya //
analyzed: rtsa rnams la yang mchod par bya //
translated: They should be worshipped in the channels.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de bzhin lha yi rang bzhin dang // lha mo'i ming ni ji ltar gsungs //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin lha yi rang bzhin dang // lha mo'i ming ni ji ltar gsungs // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: How are the natures of the gods and the names of the goddesses taught?

original: sngon du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i lha mo ji lta bu zhes de'i yul la dri ba lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o //
analyzed: sngon du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i lha mo ji lta bu zhes de'i yul la dri ba lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o //
translated: This is the fifty-fifth question regarding the goddesses abiding in the previously mentioned mandala circle.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las //
translated: As will be explained,

original: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
translated: Then the Blessed One said:

original: lha rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid mchog / rnal 'byor bde ba rtogs pa rnams //
analyzed: lha rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid mchog / rnal 'byor bde ba rtogs pa rnams //
translated: The supreme characteristics of the gods, the realizations of the bliss of yoga,

original: rtsa yi dbye ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: rtsa yi dbye ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: By the nature of the divisions of the channels,

original: rtag tu lus la rtsed 'jo bya //
analyzed: rtag tu lus la rtsed 'jo bya //
translated: Always play in the body.

original: de yis lha rnams su ni bshad //
analyzed: de yis lha rnams su ni bshad //
translated: By that, they are explained as gods.

original: rtag tu bde ba kun gyi dga' //
analyzed: rtag tu bde ba kun gyi dga' //
translated: Always delighting in all bliss,

original: kun nas rnam par sgeg pa'i lus //
analyzed: kun nas rnam par sgeg pa'i lus //
translated: The body is completely charming.

original: bde ba chen po yi ni bzhi //
analyzed: bde ba chen po yi ni bzhi //
translated: The four are of great bliss.

original: lha nyid du ni yang dag brjod //
analyzed: lha nyid du ni yang dag brjod //
translated: They are rightly called the deities.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'dis ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
analyzed: 'dis ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
translated: Here, following the Great Yoga Tantra,

original: gtso bo ma yin pa'i don du bshad pa'i yul gyi dri ba'i tshogs gsungs nas /
analyzed: gtso bo ma yin pa'i don du bshad pa'i yul gyi dri ba'i tshogs gsungs nas /
translated: having explained the group of questions about the secondary meaning,

original: da ni slar yang gtso bo dang gtso bo ma yin pa'i dbye bas rgyud du thog mar gsungs pa'i /🔽'di skad bdag @30a * //
analyzed: da ni slar yang gtso bo dang gtso bo ma yin pa'i dbye bas rgyud du thog mar gsungs pa'i / 'di skad bdag @30a * //
translated: now again, by the division of primary and secondary, he explains the group of questions about the primary meaning, which was first taught in the tantra.

original: sogs ji lta bu //
analyzed: sogs ji lta bu //
translated: How is it that “thus have I heard,” etc.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.🔽The meaning taught in the glorious Guhyasamaja, etc., is extensive.

original: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs par bstan pa'i don rgyas par zhes bya ba ni de'i yul la dri ba lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o //
analyzed: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs par bstan pa'i don rgyas par zhes bya ba ni de'i yul la dri ba lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o //
translated: This is the fifty-sixth question about its object.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained,

original: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //
translated: then the Bhagavat Vajra

original: ae bam zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis //
analyzed: ae bam zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis //
translated: said the two syllables E and VAM.

original: ae ni stong pa nyid du gsungs //
analyzed: ae ni stong pa nyid du gsungs //
translated: E is said to be emptiness.

original: de bzhin bam ni thugs rje dang // thig le gnyis ni sbyor las byung //
analyzed: de bzhin bam ni thugs rje dang // thig le gnyis ni sbyor las byung //
translated: and the two bindus arise from union.

original: ae bam gnyis ni sangs rgyas rnams //
analyzed: ae bam gnyis ni sangs rgyas rnams //
translated: The two, e and vaṃ, are the buddhas.

original: mdor bsdus chos kyi phyag rgya ni //
analyzed: mdor bsdus chos kyi phyag rgya ni //
translated: In brief, the dharma mudra

original: rgyal po chen po'i phyag rgya nyid //
analyzed: rgyal po chen po'i phyag rgya nyid //
translated: is the mudra of the great king.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.🔽How is this and so forth, the first statement,

original: 'di skad ces sogs dang po'i ngag / don rgyas par ni ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di skad ces sogs dang po'i ngag / don rgyas par ni ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: to be expanded in meaning?

original: zhes bya ba ni yi ge re re'i bshad pa'i dbye bas spas pa'i don gyi yul la dri ba lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yi ge re re'i bshad pa'i dbye bas spas pa'i don gyi yul la dri ba lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o //
translated: This is the fifty-seventh question regarding the domain of the extensive meaning, differentiated by the explanations of each syllable.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained:

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon //
translated: Now listen, I will explain further.

original: ae bam la sogs don rgyas pa //
analyzed: ae bam la sogs don rgyas pa //
translated: The extensive meaning of e, vaṃ, and so forth,

original: gong gi yang dag yongs shes pa //
analyzed: gong gi yang dag yongs shes pa //
translated: the perfect knowledge above,

original: chos kyi de nyid yang dag rtogs //
analyzed: chos kyi de nyid yang dag rtogs //
translated: realizes the thatness of phenomena.

original: ae ni shes rab dam pa ste //
analyzed: ae ni shes rab dam pa ste //
translated: E is sublime wisdom,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: and so forth.

original: nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg ci //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg ci //
translated: What is the inner fire offering?

original: zhes bya ba /
analyzed: zhes bya ba /
translated: Thus it is asked.

original: cho gnyi shu pa'i las kyi skabs su sbyin sreg gsungs pa yang spyi'i sbyin sreg gi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg ji lta bar 'gyur zhes de'i yul la dri ba lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: cho gnyi shu pa'i las kyi skabs su sbyin sreg gsungs pa yang spyi'i sbyin sreg gi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg ji lta bar 'gyur zhes de'i yul la dri ba lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
translated: How is it the inner fire sacrifice, which is devoid of the characteristics of a general fire sacrifice?

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained:

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon //
translated: Now listen, I will explain further.🔽The inner fire sacrifice is supreme.

original: nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg mchog / nang du rgyu ba'i 'byung ba rnams //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg mchog / nang du rgyu ba'i 'byung ba rnams //
translated: The elements moving within,

translated: Likewise, the question regarding the master is “What is the master?” because he is the one who teaches the conduct of the maṇḍala and so on.🔽The question regarding the object of Vajradhara is “What is Vajradhara?” because he is able to subjugate and accept.

translated: What are the results of that?

original: zhi ba rgyas pa dbang dang ni //
analyzed: zhi ba rgyas pa dbang dang ni //
translated: Pacification, increase, power,🔽and likewise killing, banishing,

original: de bzhin bsad dang bskrad pa dang // rengs dang dbye ba nyid dang ni //
analyzed: de bzhin bsad dang bskrad pa dang // rengs dang dbye ba nyid dang ni //
translated: paralyzing, and separating,🔽and in practice, assault,

original: bsgrub pa la ni mngon spyod dang // ji ltar bsgrub par sbyor ba dang // zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bsgrub pa la ni mngon spyod dang // ji ltar bsgrub par sbyor ba dang // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: and the application of practice,🔽are the results of the disciple’s practice.

original: slob mas spyod pa'i 'bras bu'i yul la dri ba bdun cu pa'o ;
analyzed: slob mas spyod pa'i 'bras bu'i yul la dri ba bdun cu pa'o ;
translated: This is the seventy-first object of inquiry into the results of the disciple’s practice.

original: / ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: / ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained,

original: de la sogs pa'i spyod shes nas //
analyzed: de la sogs pa'i spyod shes nas //
translated: knowing the practice and so on,

original: slob ma'i 'bras bu gang byung ba //
analyzed: slob ma'i 'bras bu gang byung ba //
translated: whatever results arise for the disciple,

original: zhi ba la sogs sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs sbyor ba yis //
translated: through the application of pacification and so on,

original: da ni de ltar bshad par bya //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: da ni de ltar bshad par bya //🔽zhes gsungs so //
translated: now that should be explained.

original: sngags kyi tshig ni ci zhig dang // mgon po khro bo'i bzlas pa ci //
analyzed: sngags kyi tshig ni ci zhig dang // mgon po khro bo'i bzlas pa ci //
translated: and what is the recitation of the wrathful lords?

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the question.

original: @32a * // bshad ma thag pa'i zhi ba la sogs pa sgrub par byed pas sngags kyi tshig dang / de bzhin du gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu po rnams kyi bzlas pa ji lta bur 'gyur zhes de'i yul la dri ba bdun cu rtsa gcig pa'o //
analyzed: @32a * // bshad ma thag pa'i zhi ba la sogs pa sgrub par byed pas sngags kyi tshig dang / de bzhin du gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu po rnams kyi bzlas pa ji lta bur 'gyur zhes de'i yul la dri ba bdun cu rtsa gcig pa'o //
translated: The mantra words are the means of accomplishing the previously mentioned pacification, etc. , and likewise, what is the recitation of the ten wrathful deities such as Yamantaka? This is the seventy-first question, which inquires about their domain.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained:

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon //
translated: Now listen as I explain further.

original: khro bo'i bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: khro bo'i bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The characteristics of the wrathful recitation🔽are such that one who recites with a wrathful mind

original: gang zhig rnal 'byor dngos grub brgyad //
analyzed: gang zhig rnal 'byor dngos grub brgyad //
translated: will attain the eight yogic powers,

original: thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //🔽khro bo'i sems kyis bzlas pa ni //
analyzed: thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med // khro bo'i sems kyis bzlas pa ni //
translated: there is no doubt about this.🔽Recitation with a wrathful mind

original: khro bo'i bzlas pa zhes byar brjod //
analyzed: khro bo'i bzlas pa zhes byar brjod //
translated: is called the wrathful recitation.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa dang // de bzhin du /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa dang // de bzhin du /
translated: And likewise:

original: na ma:sa manta k'a ya b'a ka tsint'a n'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: na ma:sa manta k'a ya b'a ka tsint'a n'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Namas samantabhadravaakcittaanam.

original: mngon shes lnga ni ji ltar thob //
analyzed: mngon shes lnga ni ji ltar thob //
translated: The five superknowledges are how obtained?

original: rnal 'byor rnams kyis de nyid mthong //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnams kyis de nyid mthong // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The yogis see reality.🔽This is the explanation of the result that was previously mentioned.🔽The question “How are the five superknowledges obtained?” is a question about the object of that [result].

original: sngon du gsungs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyi rgyas par bshad pa dri ba mngon par shes pa lnga ji ltar thob ces de'i yul la dri ba dang / de kho na nyid mthong ba yongs su dri ba nyid kyi ngo bo rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa dang /
analyzed: sngon du gsungs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyi rgyas par bshad pa dri ba mngon par shes pa lnga ji ltar thob ces de'i yul la dri ba dang / de kho na nyid mthong ba yongs su dri ba nyid kyi ngo bo rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa dang /
translated: The question “How is reality seen?” is a question about the nature of the result.

original: bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o //
analyzed: bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o //
translated: The seventy-second and seventy-third🔽are the answers to those questions, respectively.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained,

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: “Next, I will explain

original: dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni //
translated: the collection of all powers,🔽the characteristics of the five superknowledges, and so on,

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog / mngon shes lnga sogs mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog / mngon shes lnga sogs mtshan nyid ni //
translated: the supreme pristine consciousness of the buddhas.🔽Kṣitigarbha, Vajrapāṇi,

original: sa snying phyag na rdo rje dang // 'jam dpal sgrib pa rnam par sel //
analyzed: sa snying phyag na rdo rje dang // 'jam dpal sgrib pa rnam par sel //
translated: Mañjuśrī, and Nīvaraṇaviṣkambhin🔽are the five:

original: byams pa lnga po 'di dag kyang //
analyzed: byams pa lnga po 'di dag kyang //
translated: Maitreya.

original: yi ge gsum dang rnam par spel //
analyzed: yi ge gsum dang rnam par spel //
translated: These are also combined with the three syllables.

original: mig dang rna ba yid dang lus //
analyzed: mig dang rna ba yid dang lus //
translated: The eye, ear, mind, and body🔽are the four:

original: rtsa yi 'khor lo byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: rtsa yi 'khor lo byin gyis brlabs //
translated: The blessing of the channel wheels.

original: mtshan gsum nyin mo de dang 'dra //
analyzed: mtshan gsum nyin mo de dang 'dra //
translated: The three signs in the day are like that.

original: mngon shes lnga nyid thob par byed //
analyzed: mngon shes lnga nyid thob par byed //
translated: One attains the five superknowledges.

original: ces gsungs pa dang / de bzhin du /
analyzed: ces gsungs pa dang / de bzhin du /
translated: And similarly,

original: bzhi pa yis ni dbang bskur bas //
analyzed: bzhi pa yis ni dbang bskur bas //
translated: By the fourth, the consecration,

original: blo ldan de nyid mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: blo ldan de nyid mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: The wise one sees reality.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: skad cig gcig la mngon byang chub //
analyzed: skad cig gcig la mngon byang chub //
translated: Enlightenment in one instant

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: This is

original: ji ltar zhes 'bras bu'i yul nyid la dri ba bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes 'bras bu'i yul nyid la dri ba bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
translated: the seventy-fourth question about the domain of the result, “How?”

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained,

original: de ni skad cig mngon byang chub //
analyzed: de ni skad cig mngon byang chub //
translated: That is enlightenment in an instant.

original: mtshan nyid skad cig mar ni brjod //
analyzed: mtshan nyid skad cig mar ni brjod //

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: lung bstan pa dang rgas pa med //🔽ces bya ba gnyis po dag gi dri ba gcig nyid do //
analyzed: lung bstan pa dang rgas pa med // ces bya ba gnyis po dag gi dri ba gcig nyid do //
translated: The prophecy and the absence of aging

original: 'bras bu rgyas par bshad pa'i ngo bo lung bstan pa dang / rgas pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de'i yul la dri @32b ba bdun cu rtsa lnga pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu rgyas par bshad pa'i ngo bo lung bstan pa dang / rgas pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de'i yul la dri @32b ba bdun cu rtsa lnga pa'o //
translated: These two are the seventy-fifth question about the domain of the nature of the extensive explanation of the result, the prophecy and the characteristic of the absence of aging.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained:

original: rdo rje rtse mor byang sems ni //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse mor byang sems ni //
translated: In the Vajra Peak, the bodhicitta

original: 'dzin pas lus ni brtan pa nyid //
analyzed: 'dzin pas lus ni brtan pa nyid //
translated: is held, and the body is stabilized.

original: de yi de nyid byang sems ni //
analyzed: de yi de nyid byang sems ni //
translated: The reality of that bodhicitta

original: rlung gi de nyid rab sbyor bas //
analyzed: rlung gi de nyid rab sbyor bas //
translated: is the reality of the wind, applied in union.

original: rigs pas steng du byed ba yin //🔽rgas pa med par the tshom med //
analyzed: rigs pas steng du byed ba yin // rgas pa med par the tshom med //
translated: By the reasoning, it is made to ascend,

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: and there is no doubt of agelessness.

original: bcud len gyi ni sbyor ba dang // zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bcud len gyi ni sbyor ba dang // zhes bya ba ni /

original: bstan pa'i lus la rgyu nyid kyi dri ba bdun cu rtsa drug pa'o //
analyzed: bstan pa'i lus la rgyu nyid kyi dri ba bdun cu rtsa drug pa'o //
translated: is the seventy-sixth question about the cause of the body of the teaching.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained:

original: sngar bshad pa yi bdud rtsi lnga //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa yi bdud rtsi lnga //
translated: The five nectars explained above

original: 'dir ni bcud kyis len du brjod pa'o //🔽ces gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dir ni bcud kyis len du brjod pa'o // ces gsungs so //

original: gser 'gyur sogs kyi bya ba dang // zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gser 'gyur sogs kyi bya ba dang // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The work of alchemy and so forth

original: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi yul la dri ba bdun cu rtsa bdun pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi yul la dri ba bdun cu rtsa bdun pa'o //

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained:

original: 'di nyid kyis ni grub par byed //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis ni grub par byed //
translated: This very thing brings about accomplishment.

original: lcags kyi gser 'gyur de bzhin no //
analyzed: lcags kyi gser 'gyur de bzhin no //
translated: Just like the elixir of the alchemists.

original: zhes gsungs so //🔽rdo rje'i phyag rgya dngos grub che //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so // rdo rje'i phyag rgya dngos grub che //
translated: Thus it is said.🔽How does one attain the great power of the vajra seal,

original: 'gro ba'i bla ma ji ltar 'thob //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bla ma ji ltar 'thob //
translated: the guru of all beings?

original: ces 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi yul la dri ba bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: ces 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi yul la dri ba bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
translated: This is the seventy-eighth question concerning the domain of supramundane powers.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained:

original: rdo rje'i phyag rgya dngos grub che //
analyzed: rdo rje'i phyag rgya dngos grub che //
translated: The great power of the vajra seal

original: zung du 'jug pa thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa thob par 'gyur //
translated: is attained through union.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: lus kyi rang bzhin gzhal yas khang //
analyzed: lus kyi rang bzhin gzhal yas khang //
translated: The nature of the body is the immeasurable mansion.

original: de yi rang bzhin ji lta bu //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de yi rang bzhin ji lta bu // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: What is its nature like?

original: phyi rol gyi gzhal yas khang spangs nas nang nyid du gzhal yas khang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten du ji ltar 'gyur zhes de'i yul la dri ba bdun cu rtsa dgu pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi gzhal yas khang spangs nas nang nyid du gzhal yas khang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten du ji ltar 'gyur zhes de'i yul la dri ba bdun cu rtsa dgu pa'o //
translated: This is the seventy-ninth question concerning the domain of the immeasurable mansion, asking how, by abandoning the external immeasurable mansion, the immeasurable mansion becomes the support of all buddhas within the body.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained:

original: lus ni gzhal yas khang du 'gyur //
analyzed: lus ni gzhal yas khang du 'gyur //
translated: The body becomes the immeasurable mansion,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi yang dag rten //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi yang dag rten //
translated: the true support of all buddhas.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is stated.

original: 'dir ni gnas so //
analyzed: 'dir ni gnas so //
translated: Here, it is the abode.

original: ji ltar gnas /🔽thim dang longs spyod bdag po sogs //
analyzed: ji ltar gnas / thim dang longs spyod bdag po sogs //
translated: How is it the abode?

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Dissolution, enjoyment, ownership, and so forth.

original: 'dir ni lus 'di nyid la gzhal yas khang gi bdag nyid gnas ni /
analyzed: 'dir ni lus 'di nyid la gzhal yas khang gi bdag nyid gnas ni /
translated: Here, in this very body, the abode is the nature of the immeasurable palace,

original: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang / zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang / tshando ha dang / nye ba'i tshando ha dang / 'dus pa can dang nye ba'i 'dus ba can dang / dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod dag gi dbye bas so //🔽thim dang longs spyod bdag po sogs //
analyzed: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang / zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang / tshando ha dang / nye ba'i tshando ha dang / 'dus pa can dang nye ba'i 'dus ba can dang / dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod dag gi dbye bas so // thim dang longs spyod bdag po sogs //
translated: divided into the abodes and the adjacent abodes, the fields and the adjacent fields, the charnel grounds and the adjacent charnel grounds, the gathering places and the adjacent gathering places.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Dissolution, enjoyment, ownership, and so forth.

original: de'i yul la dri ba rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du brgyad cu tham pa dang / brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'o //
analyzed: de'i yul la dri ba rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du brgyad cu tham pa dang / brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'o //
translated: The questions about the objects of those are the eighty and the eighty-first, respectively.

original: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: As will be explained:

original: de la gnas kyi dbye ba ni //
analyzed: de la gnas kyi dbye ba ni //
translated: The divisions of the abodes

original: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya //
analyzed: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya //
translated: are explained in brief.

original: pulli ra ma mgo por @33a * //
analyzed: pulli ra ma mgo por @33a * //
translated: Pūrṇagiri is the head.

original: shes ; / zhes gsungs pa dang / de bzhin du /
analyzed: shes ; / zhes gsungs pa dang / de bzhin du /
translated: And similarly:

original: de nyid dang ldan shes par bya //
analyzed: de nyid dang ldan shes par bya //
translated: One should know that it is endowed with that.

original: thim dang longs spyod bdag po nyid //
analyzed: thim dang longs spyod bdag po nyid //
translated: Dissolution, enjoyment, and ownership.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: rlung ni gang gi mtshan nyid ci //
analyzed: rlung ni gang gi mtshan nyid ci //
translated: What is the characteristic of wind?

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: srog la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga'i dbye ba'i mtshan nyid de ci zhes de'i yul la dri ba ni brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: srog la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga'i dbye ba'i mtshan nyid de ci zhes de'i yul la dri ba ni brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
translated: The question about its object is the eighty-second, with the characteristic of a division into five kinds by the division of life-force, etc.
